quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: To be or not to be. That's not really a question.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin

quote: My life needs editing.
author: Mort Sahl

quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
author: Chris Rock

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Be stupid, be dumb, be funny, if that's who you are. Don't try to be someone that society wants you to be; that's stupid. So be yourself.
author: Christina Grimmie

quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
author: Luis Bunuel

quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
author: Ron White

quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
author: Eminem

quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: I used to be Snow White, but I drifted.
author: Mae West

quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I was sleeping the other night, alone, thanks to the exterminator.
author: Emo Philips

quote: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
author: James A. Garfield

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: It's such a funny thing when you see your daughter transitioning from your baby, your little girl, to suddenly being a young woman. If you're not really looking for it, you can miss it, and Lily-Rose is on that road already, and there's nothing I can do to stop it.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
author: E. B. White

quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Weather forecast for tonight: dark.
author: George Carlin

quote: I buy expensive suits. They just look cheap on me.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: All generalizations are false, including this one.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm quite sarcastic, and I'm funny, but not kind of funny. It's a weird funny, and some people don't get me, and some people do.
author: Millie Bobby Brown

quote: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
author: Thor Heyerdahl

quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
author: George Carlin

quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Part of my act is meant to shake you up. It looks like I'm being funny, but I'm reminding you of other things. Life is tough, darling. Life is hard. And we better laugh at everything; otherwise, we're going down the tube.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: As for our majority... one is enough.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: What's another word for Thesaurus?
author: Steven Wright

quote: One of the funny things about the stock market is that every time one person buys, another sells, and both think they are astute.
author: William Feather

quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
author: George Carlin

quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: We are supposed to enjoy the good stuff now, while we can, with the people we love. Life has a funny way of teaching us that lesson over and over again.
author: Sheena Easton

quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: I had everything I'd hoped for, but I wasn't being myself. So I decided to be honest about who I was. It was strange: The people who loved me for being funny suddenly didn't like me for being... me.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Drawing on my fine command of the English language, I said nothing.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: We owe a lot to Thomas Edison - if it wasn't for him, we'd be watching television by candlelight.
author: Milton Berle

quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory.
author: Josh Billings

quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
author: Alex Haley

quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Never put a sock in a toaster.
author: Eddie Izzard

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: You can lead a man to Congress, but you can't make him think.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Do not worry about avoiding temptation. As you grow older it will avoid you.
author: Joey Adams

quote: I have had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Reality continues to ruin my life.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Sometimes I'm really funny, sometimes I'm quiet, sometimes I'm shy, but I'm constantly changing.
author: Elle King

quote: It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.
author: Kate Bosworth

quote: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I think the eyes flirt most. There are so many ways to use them.
author: Anna Held

quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I would never die for my beliefs because I might be wrong.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: If at first you don't succeed... so much for skydiving.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: I don't care what the haters and naysayers say. If they make jokes about me, I'll laugh because they'll probably be funny.
author: Paula Deen

quote: You know, you can touch a stick of dynamite, but if you touch a venomous snake it'll turn around and bite you and kill you so fast it's not even funny.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: I am interested in shows that are not out-and-out gag fests: you see the truth of a broken heart behind them. That is what life is like: it's really funny, you see funny things as soon as you step out of the room, but underneath that is a whole bag of broken hearts. It's that real pain and that real hilarity that makes life so intriguing.
author: Tamsin Greig

quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I know my strong points: I work hard, I have talent, I'm funny, and I'm a good person.
author: Pink

quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: My father would take me to the playground, and put me on mood swings.
author: Jay London

quote: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: It's funny what memory does, isn't it? My favorite holiday tradition might not have happened more than once or twice. But because it is such a good memory, so encapsulating of everything I love about the holidays, in my mind it happened every year. Without fail.
author: Molly O'Keefe

quote: I have a new philosophy. I'm only going to dread one day at a time.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
author: George Carlin

quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
author: Buddy Hackett

quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
author: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: I was just a goofy little funny kid, who was always getting sent to the principal. It wasn't serious because I was smart. I wasn't like a true troublemaker, just rambunctious - like, talkative and trying to be funny. That was me in middle-school.
author: J. Cole

quote: There's nothing I dislike more than being in a photo shoot where they say, 'Be yourself.' That's not why I became an actress. That's what I find so funny: that you become an actor, and all of a sudden, everyone wants to know about you. But I didn't become an actor so I could show you me.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: Ignoring fame was my rebellion, in a funny way. I was insistent on being normal and doing normal things. It probably wasn't advisable to go to college in America and room with a complete stranger. And it probably wasn't wise to share a bathroom with eight other people in a coed dorm. Looking back, that was crazy.
author: Emma Watson

quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Too much agreement kills a chat.
author: Eldridge Cleaver

quote: I was eating in a Chinese restaurant downtown. There was a dish called Mother and Child Reunion. It's chicken and eggs. And I said, I gotta use that one.
author: Paul Simon

quote: Expert: a man who makes three correct guesses consecutively.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
author: Mae West

quote: Nobody ever went broke underestimating the taste of the American public.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I basically started performing for my mother, going, 'Love me!' What drives you to perform is the need for that primal connection. When I was little, my mother was funny with me, and I started to be charming and funny for her, and I learned that by being entertaining, you make a connection with another person.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny. Next. Everyone gets so upset about the wrong things.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Guilt: the gift that keeps on giving.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Yield to temptation. It may not pass your way again.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
author: Ben Stein

quote: There's only one true superpower amongst human beings, and that is being funny. People treat you differently if you can make them laugh.
author: Jeff Garlin

quote: Cure for an obsession: get another one.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Honestly, I like someone who is really grounded, super sweet, honest. I need them to have a sense of humor. I need them to laugh at what's funny, I need them to get jokes and be funny and be witty and sarcastic.
author: Casper Smart

quote: I'm not funny. What I am is brave.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: If you want to be thought a liar, always tell the truth.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: It sounds funny, but my biggest fear is that I'm not perfect. I'm a perfectionist, and I get upset when things go wrong or when I don't do well.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Be obscure clearly.
author: E. B. White

quote: Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: I got attention by being funny at school, pretending to be retarded, and jumping around with a deformed hand.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: All men are equal before fish.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: It's a funny thing. I'll be in my home town of Columbus at a restaurant or something, and the waiter maybe asks, 'What do you do?' and I say, 'Oh, I'm in a band... Twenty One Pilots,' and he'll say, 'Cool, I'll check it out. I never heard of them.' And then I say, 'In September we're playing the Schottenstein Center,' and it's like, 'What?!'
author: Tyler Joseph

quote: It is funny that men who are supposed to be scientific cannot get themselves to realise the basic principle of physics, that action and reaction are equal and opposite, that when you persecute people you always rouse them to be strong and stronger.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: I think if everyone would write down the funny stories from their own childhoods, the world would be a better place.
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: Memories are doing funny things to us.
author: Milos Forman

quote: I don't think I would do a straight late-night talk show, like a 'Tonight Show' kind of thing. But I'm open to whatever is done well. I don't have any agenda. I'm not like Fugazi - I'm not trying to be just so punk rock until I die. Whatever is funny is good.
author: Eric Andre

quote: I'm attracted to women who are smart and funny and ambitious and have lives of their own and great families. Isn't that what attracts anyone?
author: Tom Brady

quote: I love airports because funny things always happen at them. They're giant complexes full of urgency, seriousness, and confusion. Where am I supposed to be? Which way do I go? And that's just the staff.
author: Rhys Darby

quote: What I am looking for is a blessing not in disguise.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: It's funny how most people love the dead, once you're dead, you're made for life.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Try to find someone with a sense of humor. That's an important thing to have because when you get into an argument, one of the best ways to diffuse it is to be funny. You don't want to hide away from a point, because some points are serious, but you'd rather have a discussion that was a discussion, rather than an argument.
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: I have never been hurt by what I have not said.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: A good actor is someone who knows how to take the part and make it real and make it honest and be effective in it. If it's in a funny movie and, as long as they are cast in an appropriate way, humor will come from it.
author: Ivan Reitman

quote: Don't talk about yourself; it will be done when you leave.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Instant gratification takes too long.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.
author: Bette Davis

quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
author: Don Marquis

quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
author: Fred Allen

quote: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name.
author: Milton Berle

quote: If you're naturally kind, you attract a lot of people you don't like.
author: William Feather

quote: I consider that a man's brain originally is like a little empty attic, and you have to stock it with such furniture as you choose.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: I find, when you're an optimist, life has a funny way of looking after you.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Turn up the lights. I don't want to go home in the dark.
author: O. Henry

quote: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint.
author: Don Marquis

quote: It's funny: I've always had the analogy of a snow globe, that Hollywood is a snow globe. No, it's true. If you shake it up, you can look at it and really enjoy it. But don't ever go in. Don't ever buy into it and be like, 'I deserve all of this!' because it can go away at any time, so just have a lot of fun.
author: John Krasinski

quote: It's funny how the music industry is enraged about the Internet and the way things are copied without being paid for. But you know why people steal the music? Because they can't afford the music.
author: Tom Petty

quote: It's funny, I'm very analytical in my real life, but in terms of my films, I try to not analyze them at all and let things just go into them and let them be what they are. I mean, people ask me to this day what 'The Squid and the Whale' stood for, and I have no idea except that it's an exhibit in the Natural History Museum.
author: Noah Baumbach

quote: When humor can be made to alternate with melancholy, one has a success, but when the same things are funny and melancholic at the same time, it's just wonderful.
author: Francois Truffaut

quote: There is a saying that if you get something for free, you should know that you're the product. It was never more true than in the case of Facebook and Gmail and YouTube. You get free social-media services, and you get free funny cat videos. In exchange, you give up the most valuable asset you have, which is your personal data.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: Animals are sentient, intelligent, perceptive, funny and entertaining. We owe them a duty of care as we do to children.
author: Michael Morpurgo

quote: The best measure of a man's honesty isn't his income tax return. It's the zero adjust on his bathroom scale.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: If my life wasn't funny, it would just be true, and that's unacceptable.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Being funny is one of my greatest strengths. I can make girls smile when they're down, and when they're having a good time, I can carry on the joke.
author: John Krasinski

quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: The funny thing is, I'm so used to not caring what anyone says, good or bad, that unfortunately even when people say good things... I wish it made me feel good, but it doesn't.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I like having a beard. What's funny is when you shave a beard, you realize how freezing cold your face is! The primary purpose evolution-wise is to keep you warm, to grow hair on your face. You shave it off, and your face is freezing for a few days.
author: Adam Scott

quote: It's not so much what you learn about Mumbai, it's what you learn about yourself, really. It's a funny old hippie thing, but it's true as well. You find out a lot about yourself and your tolerance, and about your inclusiveness.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
author: Jack Benny

quote: I can't stress to you enough how much I can relate to teens being cyberbullied. Something that helps me is looking at old videos of me and my friends from middle school, or videos of my family. I love watching funny videos of my favorite people - it really cheers me up.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: I'm going to take this God-given gift of being funny, and I'm going to spread it out like peanut butter on everything I do.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: I'm spending a year dead for tax reasons.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Turns out you have a really fun time if you go to work every day and focus on being silly and funny and happy!
author: Hannah Murray

quote: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often - but I'm well preserved.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Macho does not prove mucho.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I bought some batteries, but they weren't included.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I never thought I was funny, but I enjoy being funny.
author: Nora Dunn

quote: Comedy is surprises, so if you're intending to make somebody laugh and they don't laugh, that's funny.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: That's my only goal. Surround myself with funny people, and make sure everyone has a good time and works hard.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age.
author: George Burns

quote: Communism is like one big phone company.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: It's funny how a chubby kid can just be having fun, and people call it entertainment!
author: Garth Brooks

quote: Actually being funny is mostly telling the truth about things.
author: Bernard Sahlins

quote: Miami Beach is where neon goes to die.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: Although I have guitars all around, and I pick them up occasionally and write a tune and make a record, I don't really see myself as a musician. It may seem a funny thing to say. It's just like, I write lyrics, and I make up songs, but I'm not a great lyricist or songwriter or producer. It's when you put all these things together - that makes me.
author: George Harrison

quote: No one wants to read a story where I saw a cute puppy on the street and I petted it. I mean, that's not funny. I only write about the funny stuff.
author: Tucker Max

quote: I tell you, it's funny because the only time I think about HIV is when I have to take my medicine twice a day.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: Stories in families are colossally important. Every family has stories: some funny, some proud, some embarrassing, some shameful. Knowing them is proof of belonging to the family.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion.
author: Fred Allen

quote: Do you know, it's funny, but I never thought of being blind as a disadvantage, and I never thought of being black as a disadvantage.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Someone told me I had funny facial expressions. I don't know whether I take that as a compliment or not, but.
author: Lucy Punch

quote: Funny is only something that others know about you - you can't be funny by yourself.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Humor has become so cliche and boring that nothing's funny anymore unless it involves something totally disgusting that offends somebody or makes them feel really uncomfortable.
author: Tom DeLonge

quote: I may be a living legend, but that sure don't help when I've got to change a flat tire.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: In comic strips, the person on the left always speaks first.
author: George Carlin

quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Anyone who says he can see through women is missing a lot.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met.
author: Herb Caen

quote: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: I went window shopping today! I bought four windows.
author: Tommy Cooper

quote: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
author: Alexander Woollcott

quote: I don't deserve this award, but I have arthritis and I don't deserve that either.
author: Jack Benny

quote: The tax collector must love poor people, he's creating so many of them.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I never said most of the things I said.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I call myself the Amusement Park. That's because I'm funny and scary at the same time.
author: Terry Crews

quote: I went to private school for a very long time, and we always wore uniforms. Then in third grade, I switched to a public school, so I was so excited to wear what I wanted on the first day. I remember I chose this orange hoodie with a skirt, and it's so funny when I think about it now because my style really hasn't changed that much.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: Fame is a funny thing. I like doing normal things. I like going to fairs. I like going to ball games. I like going to Disney World or a big field on the Fourth of July and having picnics with friends. The problem is you're either worried you're going to be recognized, or you're thankful you're not. It's always there.
author: Chris Evans

quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
author: Saul Bellow

quote: Comedy is a tool of togetherness. It's a way of putting your arm around someone, pointing at something, and saying, 'Isn't it funny that we do that?' It's a way of reaching out.
author: Kate McKinnon

quote: If it's the Psychic Network why do they need a phone number?
author: Robin Williams

quote: Chaos in the midst of chaos isn't funny, but chaos in the midst of order is.
author: Steve Martin

quote: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: If you could cross a lion and a monkey, that's what I'd be, because monkeys are funny and lions are strong.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: I grew up as a very sarcastic person. I was always the class clown, and to date girls, I had to be really funny. I was really skinny growing up. I was so thin, I had to run around in the shower to get wet. That kind of thin. So I always had to rely on humor and sarcasm.
author: Kurt Fuller

quote: A two-year-old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My favorite kind of humor is basically, if it was happening to you, it wouldn't be funny, but to observe it, it's hilarious.
author: Bill Burr

quote: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: It seems like everybody's perception of me is very bipolar. To one group, it's overpaid, overrated; to another group, it's underpaid, underrated, underdog. It's funny to me because there's no real balance.
author: Jeremy Lin

quote: I'm not that good looking. That's why 'Gangnam Style' works. If someone handsome uses that phrase it's just awkward. But if someone like me uses it, it's funny.
author: Psy

quote: Men are liars. We'll lie about lying if we have to. I'm an algebra liar. I figure two good lies make a positive.
author: Tim Allen

quote: If you're going to tell people the truth, be funny or they'll kill you.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: What contemptible scoundrel has stolen the cork to my lunch?
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Television has brought back murder into the home - where it belongs.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: The first day one is a guest, the second a burden, and the third a pest.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: It's funny. All you have to do is say something nobody understands and they'll do practically anything you want them to.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: My favorite type of pet has always been a dog. They're loyal, kind, and offer endless affection. My friend Eric says, 'The more people I meet, the more I like my dog.' Funny thought.
author: Brendon Urie

quote: I'm just not one of those naturally funny, relaxed actors who enjoy the spotlight and are so good at it.
author: Heath Ledger

quote: I heard that people were really interested in the new haircut, which I think is so funny. Great haircut, I really like it. It goes great with the time period. And I was super, super, super-happy to have my bangs swept to the side rather than straight in front of me, which I dealt with for three seasons. I'm very, very much done with that.
author: Elisabeth Moss

quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Christopher Columbus, as everyone knows, is honored by posterity because he was the last to discover America.
author: James Joyce

quote: It may sound funny, but I love the South. I don't choose to live anywhere else. There's land here, where a man can raise cattle, and I'm going to do it some day.
author: Medgar Evers

quote: I'm 42 and the age of a guy who has kids, so I guess I'm playing right where I'm supposed to be. I'm comfortable with that, but in the same breath I'd do something edgy. If someone came to me and offered me an edgy and funny story, then I'd do it.
author: Eddie Murphy

quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry.
author: O. Henry

quote: I read a funny story about how the Republicans freed the slaves. The Republicans are the ones who created slavery by law in the 1600's. Abraham Lincoln freed the slaves and he was not a Republican.
author: Marion Barry

quote: When I have had a long day at work, I want something to watch that is funny, lighthearted and easy to get into, and reality is that. I'm not really into serious programmes or documentaries.
author: Amy Childs

quote: I am certain there is too much certainty in the world.
author: Michael Crichton

quote: All these jokes have been pre-approved as funny by me.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I discovered that funny animal pictures - memes - would get a lot of likes and shares.
author: George Takei

quote: The drawings in 'Portal' were actually me scribbling that stuff... I had a funny moment when I realized that someone gotten 'The cake is a lie' tattooed on themselves. It was really interesting to see my handwriting tattooed on another human being. That... that's odd.
author: Kim Swift

quote: Never floss with a stranger.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Show me one guy or woman as funny as Rodney Dangerfield or as good as George Carlin, Richard Pryor, Bill Cosby, or Joan Rivers. There are a lot of good comics out there, no doubt, but as far as the quality of the comics goes, I think what you have is a bunch of situational comics.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I don't write material. Funny things happen to me in the course of a day, and I just make notes.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: I have the curse of thinking funny!
author: Adam West

quote: My mother was a very, very funny, outrageous, outspoken person, and she never edited me. Her whole thing in my life was if anybody had a problem with me, tell them to go to hell.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: The great thing for me about 'The Resurrection of Gavin Stone' is it's a throwback to the old fashioned Hollywood movie that you can watch with your family, has a message, and is funny and entertaining. They didn't call them faith-based movies; they just called them good movies.
author: D. B. Sweeney

quote: I never drink water because of the disgusting things that fish do in it.
author: Unknown

quote: It is a scientific fact that your body will not absorb cholesterol if you take it from another person's plate.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I've always found it easier to be funny than to be serious.
author: Molly Ivins

quote: Something funny certainly happens when palladium and platinum come into contact with hydrogen gas; it's one of the great mysteries still waiting to be solved on the periodic table. But it's quite a leap from 'something funny' to cold fusion.
author: Sam Kean

quote: I find it funny how people from Boston and New York hate each other because of pro teams. But, like, everyone on the Red Sox is a random millionaire athlete from somewhere else.
author: Julian Casablancas

quote: I am blessed with a funny gene that makes me enjoy life.
author: Karan Patel

quote: I think it's one of those funny things - sometimes you're not really friends with somebody until you've gotten into a good fight, and I think that's the situation with Superman and Batman.
author: Mark Valley

quote: I try to sign for as many kids as possible. Kids come first, and I'll always sign for a kid before an adult. It's funny, because I was never big into autographs as a kid. The only player who I ever wanted an autograph from was Dave Winfield.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I hear a lot of people singing in funny voices and singing like they're stupid. Singing in a deliberately fey and dumb and childish way. And I find it to be a disturbing trend.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: When I was a boy the Dead Sea was only sick.
author: George Burns

quote: Let's have some new cliches.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: A nickel ain't worth a dime anymore.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I have an unfortunate personality.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Filming is a funny combination of having a good time and not being able to wait until it's over.
author: Nicole Holofcener

quote: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The funny thing is that my husband couldn't be sweeter. He looks like this bad boy. He's got tattoos and earrings and a mohawk, but when you talk to him and he's around you, he's such a gentleman. He holds doors for ladies. He pulls out chairs. He cooks. He cleans.
author: Malin Akerman

quote: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: I hate housework! You make the beds, you do the dishes and six months later you have to start all over again.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: It's funny: people who meet me say, 'I thought you'd be different.' But I'm still the same guy.
author: Bill Engvall

quote: I'm so single. It's funny. I'm usually a relationship girl. I love being in love and having a partner in crime. But it's good to be your own partner in crime. God, that makes me sound like I have multiple-personality disorder.
author: Brittany Snow

quote: I always believe that funny is serious and serious is funny. You don't really need a distinction between them.
author: Trevor Noah

quote: The parrot's so funny. He imitates me and I don't even realize he's doing it. I'm walking around the house talking to myself and whistling and the next day he's said something I've said... it's scary you know?
author: Mick Ralphs

quote: Being a funny person does an awful lot of things to you. You feel that you mustn't get serious with people. They don't expect it from you, and they don't want to see it. You're not entitled to be serious, you're a clown.
author: Fanny Brice

quote: It's a funny thing, the less people have to live for, the less nerve they have to risk losing nothing.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
author: Eminem

quote: I see fighters make funny videos about me and stick them on Facebook and get 20 likes. When I make a video, I sell it to Fox and make seven figures. That's the difference.
author: Conor McGregor

quote: I failed to make the chess team because of my height.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: Just telling the facts are no longer enough. You now have to be persuasive, charismatic, interesting, and funny. Just telling people things isn't enough anymore.
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: Even Napoleon had his Watergate.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: My grandchildren are fabulous and funny.
author: Erica Jong

quote: When people say 'Charlie Chaplin' I still think now of the guy in the moustache and bowler hat and funny walk - I don't think of an old man who was my grandfather.
author: Oona Chaplin

quote: I spent a year in that town, one Sunday.
author: George Burns

quote: Progress might have been alright once, but it has gone on too long.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: No, no, I was only funny on stage, really. I, I, think I was funny as a person toward my classmates when I was very young. You know, when I was a child, up to about the age of 12.
author: Rowan Atkinson

quote: I love my brothers' kids. It's funny - as an uncle, you become so protective of them.
author: Liam Hemsworth

quote: It's a funny thing that when a man hasn't anything on earth to worry about, he goes off and gets married.
author: Robert Frost

quote: I don't feel that I'm explaining the world or teaching people anything. And I'm not trying to be a mirror, showing them what's really going on the world. All I'm trying to do is think of stuff that's funny, just like when I'm kidding around with my friends.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Children are smarter than any of us. Know how I know that? I don't know one child with a full time job and children.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: I don't think it's any coincidence that I lost my religious faith and 'manned up' in the same year. I was described somewhere as a lapsed Catholic, which is funny because I'm not going back! I want to achieve things rather than live life in an animalistic way.
author: Jimmy Carr

quote: I guess when you turn off the main road, you have to be prepared to see some funny houses.
author: Stephen King

quote: I like a woman with a head on her shoulders. I hate necks.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Some people say funny things, but I say things funny.
author: Don Rickles

quote: I was a vegetarian until I started leaning toward the sunlight.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: The avant-garde theater is fun; it is free-swinging, bold, iconoclastic, and often wildly, wildly funny. If you will approach it with childlike innocence - putting your standard responses aside, for they do not apply - if you will approach it on its own terms, I think you will be in for a liberating surprise.
author: Edward Albee

quote: I know some people say I can be funny. But there is always a deeper meaning to what I say. I am a socialist at heart and have the interests of the poor in mind. When people see how I manage to work my way out of tough situations, it gives them hope in their own life.
author: Lalu Prasad Yadav

quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: The day I made that statement, about the inventing the internet, I was tired because I'd been up all night inventing the Camcorder.
author: Al Gore

quote: If love is the answer, could you please rephrase the question?
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Life was a funny thing that happened to me on the way to the grave.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: Novels are not about expressing yourself, they're about something beautiful, funny, clever and organic. Self-expression? Go and ring a bell in a yard if you want to express yourself.
author: Zadie Smith

quote: Maybe people don't see me as believable playing a person of today. I guess I'm just more realistic in a corset and funny hairstyles.
author: Katie McGrath

quote: When we talk to God, we're praying. When God talks to us, we're schizophrenic.
author: Jane Wagner

quote: The superfluous, a very necessary thing.
author: Voltaire

quote: A word to the wise is infuriating.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I always have a funny story at communion time that underscores that no one is perfect, and that communion is not for perfect people but for hungry people.
author: Greg Boyle

quote: I don't need you to remind me of my age. I have a bladder to do that for me.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: I was so naive as a kid I used to sneak behind the barn and do nothing.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Selling wine is all about sizing people up, and it takes a certain amount of chutzpah. The tableside bottle sell is a very funny thing - you take a look at the guy's blazer, what kind of shoes he's wearing, what kind of broad he's with. Is he trying to be a hero?
author: Joe Bastianich

quote: 'Crash' came from personal experience. I saw things inside me from living in L.A. that made me uncomfortable. I saw horrible things in people and saw terrible things in myself. I saw a black director completely humiliated, but the three people around me just thought it was funny. 'No,' I said, 'that is selling your soul.'
author: Paul Haggis

quote: In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.
author: Rosie Perez

quote: One longs to be funny, to make people laugh. Laughter is such a sign of approval, isn't it?
author: Tom Baker

quote: I don't say things to be offensive; I say things because they're funny to me. It amuses me.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: I think being funny is not anyone's first choice.
author: Woody Allen

quote: The funny guy doesn't get the girl until later in life. High school, college, everyone still wants the brooding, dangerous guy you shouldn't have.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: Inappropriateness is funny to me. Rudeness is hilarious.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: Everything that used to be a sin is now a disease.
author: Bill Maher

quote: The follow your dreams thing is really important because so many people are railroaded into taking other paths by their family, their friends, people who should be supportive going, 'What are you talking about?' Even just seemingly regular career paths, but if it's not what people expect for you they kind of react funny.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I think I have an inner confidence that my tastes are pretty simple, that what I find funny finds a wide audience. I'm not particularly intellectual or clever or minority-focused in my creative instincts. And I'm certainly not aware of suppressing more sophisticated ambitions.
author: Rowan Atkinson

quote: We owe to the Middle Ages the two worst inventions of humanity - romantic love and gunpowder.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: A good joke can spread throughout the Internet between the time you go to bed and the time you wake up, leading to an inbox filled with pictures of funny cats and cheeseburgers.
author: Rosanna Pansino

quote: I have seen and heard comedians who had really funny 'stuff' but yet could not make the people laugh; then, again - I have seen others whose stuff was anything but humorous, and the audience would howl with laughter.
author: Al Jolson

quote: Funny is the world I live in. You're funny, I'm interested. You're not funny, I'm not interested.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: It is possible to have good manners and be funny at the same time. Ronnie Barker and I proved that.
author: Ronnie Corbett

quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: When you see things upside down, the ego can be extraordinarily funny; it's absurd. But it's tragic at the same time.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: What I like best is a book that's at least funny once in a while. What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: The reason there are two senators for each state is so that one can be the designated driver.
author: Jay Leno

quote: I've always surrounded myself with funny people.
author: Leslie Mann

quote: What does being a woman today mean? Is there a right way of doing it? Is there a wrong way of doing it? Different kinds of women, female friendships: It's all pretty funny, and worth making fun of.
author: Elizabeth Meriwether

quote: I quit therapy because my analyst was trying to help me behind my back.
author: Richard Lewis

quote: Girls don't poop, so don't claim you do. You can fart - because farting is funny - but we don't want to know that you poop.
author: Ryan Hansen

quote: It's a funny thing: my name in Arabic means hope, so I suppose I have to live by that principle. Hope is desire, feeling, and investing in a projection of something that doesn't yet exist. At its best, you witness its alchemy in your life, turning something that was once in the mind into reality. At its worst, it's delusion.
author: Aml Ameen

quote: I like children - fried.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: What do I know of man's destiny? I could tell you more about radishes.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: The audience changes every night. You're the same person. You have to speak your mind and do the stuff that you think is funny and makes you laugh.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: Parents are the last people on earth who ought to have children.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Its funny, because for females in general - not just in music, but the corporate ladder as well - anything we do has always been harder for us. When it comes to music, the industry wants you to conform, to look like this and to sound like this and do this or that. It makes it harder. It's harder for us to come out and be bosses and lead the pack.
author: Missy Elliott

quote: I love Felicity Jones. It was funny because I went to go see the 'Rogue One' set, and I was like, 'Oh my God, I love you.' And she's so tiny, and elegant, and she's just so small. Everyone's so much smaller than they seem.
author: Daisy Ridley

quote: The funny thing about the people I don't like - they're very self-centered.
author: Brendon Urie

quote: I don't really talk about my personal life. It's a strange and funny and weird thing. Sometimes you have a conversation with someone and the paparazzi snaps a picture of you and people decide you're dating. If I try to answer everything people say, I would be up all night.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I write funny. If I can make my wife laugh, I know I'm on the right track.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: I rant, therefore I am.
author: Dennis Miller

quote: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: We need two kinds of acquaintances, one to complain to, while to the others we boast.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: It's so funny, I've done so many projects where I've been interrogated. I guest starred on almost every hour drama, and I'm always the guy they think is the bad guy but then they find out is not.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: Somebody said something funny to me the other day. They said, 'Wolper, until two weeks ago, your tombstone was going to say, 'David Wolper, the man who produced 'Roots.' I think the tombstone now has a new inscription. It's going to be 'David Wolper, the man who produced the opening ceremony of the 1984 Olympics.'
author: David L. Wolper

quote: 'Lucky' is for laughs, and there's really nothing funny that I'm doing on 'Dexter.' I think more than anything, both comment on the fact that anybody is capable of anything. Just because they are the shy guy in the corner doesn't mean that they are a harmless little bunny.
author: Colin Hanks

quote: The inspiration for my Vines comes from thinking about funny and relatable experiences from my daily life.
author: Lele Pons

quote: Crashing is never funny, but sometimes you can jump up, laugh at your stupidity, and go, 'What the hell was that?'
author: Jens Voigt

quote: I think my funny books are my favorites because I like to laugh so much.
author: Dav Pilkey

quote: If you're OK with being clumsy, it's funny. But if you are super embarrassed, people are going to laugh at you.
author: Leo Howard

quote: I never expected to see the day when girls would get sunburned in the places they now do.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I wear black skinny-fit jeans - I can't get away from them. It's funny because I wore baggy jeans for ages, then one day my friend convinced me to try on a skinny pair and I thought they were great.
author: Shaun White

quote: I'm a pretty funny guy, and I would love to do a comedy with a bunch of funny guys - movie-star guys, where they could help me through it.
author: LeBron James

quote: I love 'Saturday Night Live,' and it's such a funny show. I don't know if I'm funny enough to be on it but definitely would be interested in doing it.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: What's funny is that you can think you really value your life until you almost lose it.
author: Alan Alda

quote: It's painful for me to watch someone who isn't funny. It's horrifying to sit in the back and watch some guy who just totally sucks.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: I'm going to marry a Jewish woman because I like the idea of getting up Sunday morning and going to the deli.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
author: Les Dawson

quote: I don't deserve any credit for turning the other cheek as my tongue is always in it.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: I didn't grow up thinking I was pretty; there was always a prettier girl than me. So I learned to be smart and tried to be funny and develop the inside of me, because I felt like that's what I had.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: I had a band before I did standup - I've always done music. I got known for being funny, and that's how I make a living - and from acting - but I never stopped playing and producing and recording music.
author: Eddie Murphy

quote: God did not intend religion to be an exercise club.
author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: Censorship no longer works by hiding information from you; censorship works by flooding you with immense amounts of misinformation, of irrelevant information, of funny cat videos, until you're just unable to focus.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: An optimist is a fellow who believes a housefly is looking for a way to get out.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: You can't do anything to be funny. That's cringeworthy. If your humor comes out of a place of love every time, you don't make the joke bigger than you. The funniest comedians are in touch with their emotional level.
author: John Krasinski

quote: Why does everyone think the future is space helmets, silver foil, and talking like computers, like a bad episode of Star Trek?
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: I would call it a comedy variety show. We have some people just doing straight standup. We usually try to have one musical act of sort. So its just people being funny in different ways, not just sketch, not just standup, not just characters, all of those things.
author: Todd Barry

quote: I was born in very sorry circumstances. Both of my parents were very sorry.
author: Norman Wisdom

quote: I'd rather not have a moment when I'm known for my looks; being funny and interesting lasts longer.
author: Kelly Ripa

quote: Everything I buy is vintage and smells funny. Maybe that's why I don't have a boyfriend.
author: Lucy Liu

quote: Hurried and worried until we're buried, and there's no curtain call, Lifes a very funny proposition after all.
author: George M. Cohan

quote: I know that I'm going to die and that you're going to die. I can't do anything about that. But I can explore it through a metaphor and make a kind of funny, dark story about it, and in doing so, really exhaust and research as many aspects of it as I can imagine. And in a way, that does give me some closure.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Men are only as loyal as their options.
author: Bill Maher

quote: Every man's dream is to be able to sink into the arms of a woman without also falling into her hands.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: It's funny to me that people find other people getting coffee really interesting, or walking their dog in the dog park.
author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quote: I wish the government would put a tax on pianos for the incompetent.
author: Edith Sitwell

quote: Being on 'Star Trek,' you have a funny relationship with fame.
author: Robert Picardo

quote: I recorded my hair this morning, tonight I'm watching the highlights.
author: Jay London

quote: Me carrying a briefcase is like a hotdog wearing earrings.
author: Sparky Anderson

quote: If at first you don't succeed, blame your parents.
author: Marcelene Cox

quote: Thinking is one thing no one has ever been able to tax.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: It's funny how we 'do' Christmas. Christmas is not something that we do, it is something that was done. It celebrates the long awaited arrival of the Messiah, Jesus Christ. We had nothing to do with it, but what we can do is praise God for the coming of the Lord, who washed away the sins of the world by dying on the cross.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: It is to be observed that 'angling' is the name given to fishing by people who can't fish.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: You know the funny thing, I don't get along with rich people. I get along with the middle class and the poor people better than I get along with the rich people.
author: Donald Trump

quote: As far as I'm concerned, 'whom' is a word that was invented to make everyone sound like a butler.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: Everybody I know who is funny, it's in them. You can teach timing, or some people are able to tell a joke, though I don't like to tell jokes. But I think you have to be born with a sense of humor and a sense of timing.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Never fight an inanimate object.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: If you're funny, if there's something that makes you laugh, then every day's going to be okay.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: You're unlikely to discover something new without a lot of practice on old stuff, but further, you should get a heck of a lot of fun out of working out funny relations and interesting things.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: I think we're all good and bad, but good's not funny. Bad is funny. Suppress the good and let the bad out, and then you can be funny.
author: Larry David

quote: The next time you have a thought... let it go.
author: Ron White

quote: To handle that stardom, the red carpets, the photo shoots, people all of a sudden recognizing you and following you in everyday life, it's a bit weird. It's strange, and it can have funny effects on you in terms of do you like it or don't you like it. Some people run away from it, some people embrace it; I found a good middle ground.
author: Roger Federer

quote: What I like about the jokes, to me it's a lot of logic, no matter how crazy they are. It has to make absolute sense, or it won't be funny.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I like bowling. I suck at it, but I like it. You know what's so funny? I have days when I'm absolutely great at doing it, and then I have days when I just don't understand it.
author: Lil' Kim

quote: There's a fine line between angry and grumpy. Angry isn't nice, but grumpy is funny.
author: Rick Wakeman

quote: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: I'm for whatever gets you through the night.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Life can be dramatic and funny all in the same day.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: He looks as though he's been weaned on a pickle.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: There's a darkness under 'The Hangover' because ultimately there's a missing person and it's not really that funny. There's a sort of darkness under it that I love, and still people are laughing as hard if not harder than they did in 'Old School.'
author: Todd Phillips

quote: I was asked to act when I couldn't act. I was asked to sing 'Funny Face' when I couldn't sing, and dance with Fred Astaire when I couldn't dance - and do all kinds of things I wasn't prepared for. Then I tried like mad to cope with it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Every man has a sane spot somewhere.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I wanna make a jigsaw puzzle that's 40,000 pieces. And when you finish it, it says 'go outside.'
author: Demetri Martin

quote: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: It's so funny, you go to acting school thinking you're going to learn how to be other people, but really it taught me how to be myself. Because it's in understanding yourself deeply that you can lend yourself to another person's circumstances and another person's experience.
author: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: I don't follow anything blindly. I have to know the entire thing, if I have to get in to it. It might sound funny to you, but it's like using English language. I use an English word only when I know its meaning and understand its connotation. You won't hear me say, 'What's up, dude' or anything like that just for the heck of it.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: When I was a kid, I never did funny things to get attention. I was never a funny person. I was never, like, 'Oh, wow. I could say this some day on stage.'
author: Steven Wright

quote: When Jonathan Winters died, it was like, 'Oh, man!' I knew he was frail, but I always thought he was going to last longer. I knew him as being really funny, but at the same time, he had a dark side.
author: Robin Williams

quote: O Lord, help me to be pure, but not yet.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: If you can't tell a spoon from a ladle, then you're fat!
author: Demetri Martin

quote: My ideal prom date would have to be cute, funny, sweet, nice.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: I believe in rules. Sure I do. If there weren't any rules, how could you break them?
author: Leo Durocher

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who would want to live in an institution?
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: It's obviously funny to be a meme, so I could be down with it in that regard, but it also belittles one's art.
author: Grimes

quote: Keep your sense of humor, my friend; if you don't have a sense of humor it just isn't funny anymore.
author: Wavy Gravy

quote: I tend to play characters that I can infuse with certain kinds of humour. Even the baddest guy can be funny in his own particular way. I want the audience to engage with the character on some deeper level so that they leave the cinema still thinking about him.
author: Samuel L. Jackson

quote: There's a difference between being a comic and a comedian. A comic is a guy who says funny things, and a comedian is a guy who says things funny, and he has a style and point of view that will last much longer.
author: Milton Berle

quote: I actually think of being funny as an odd turn of mind, like a mild disability, some weird way of looking at the world that you can't get rid of.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: What was really funny is that as I got older all those guys who called me a sissy in junior high school wanted me to be their best friend because they wanted to meet all the girls that I knew in figure skating.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: The thing I most hate about the Left is that they want to stop us laughing - to prescribe which jokes are OK and which are not OK to make in public and to draw artificial lines around certain subjects. I find all sorts of inappropriate things funny.
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: If God wanted us to fly, He would have given us tickets.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Include me out.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: The human brain is a funny thing: it's very susceptible to tempo and melody. You put the right words to it, and it becomes very influential.
author: Ray Stevens

quote: When I'm on stage, it's really intense. My mind is going a million miles an hour, trying to remember my act, trying to say it all the right way. It's funny how different it looks and how it's happening. There are three Fellini circuses in my head, and outwardly it looks like I'm going to get a bagel.
author: Steven Wright

quote: People always ask me, 'Were you funny as a child?' Well, no, I was an accountant.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: I think it's a comedian's job to make everything funny. Nothing is off-limits.
author: Donald Glover

quote: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
author: James Thurber

quote: I usually stalk fans because I think they're really funny on Twitter. They don't know it, but I'll just go through their timelines, and if something is happening in the media, I always read fan accounts instead of the news because they have all the info and make the funniest jokes about it, so that's how I get my gossip - by stalking fans.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: Maybe that is why kids like Dumbledore: because he is funny rather than a miserable old sod with a long white beard.
author: Michael Gambon

quote: I've never been to a dinner party where everyone at the dinner table didn't say something funny.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: I think I have a dark view of the world. I have to make everything funny, otherwise it all seems so sad.
author: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: I don't care how handsome or fabulous or funny the groom is, or how sweet and accommodating the bride, or vice versa. Marriage is hard.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: Funny thing is that the poorer people are, the more generous they seem to be.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: The IRS! They're like the Mafia, they can take anything they want!
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I love every minute of fatherhood, staying up all night, changing nappies, kids crying, I find it really funny and inspiring. It connects you to the world in a new way.
author: Elton John

quote: Only bad golfers are lucky. They're the ones bouncing balls off trees, curbs, turtles and cars. Good golfers have bad luck. When you hit the ball straight, a funny bounce is bound to be unlucky.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: Unless someone wants to look funny, I'll not recommend anyone to copy my bowling action. But on a serious note, with the confidence that I have got from the amount of runs I have been scoring, when I'm thrown the ball to bowl, I am pretty sure of what I have to do. I may not be the most attractive to watch while bowling, but I can be effective.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: There is nothing funny about Halloween. This sarcastic festival reflects, rather, an infernal demand for revenge by children on the adult world.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: You win a race, the next race it's a question mark. Are you still the best or not? That's what is funny. But that's what is interesting. And that's what is challenging. You have to prove yourself every time.
author: Michael Schumacher

quote: If something is shocking without being funny it's hard to justify.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: I make funny videos of me playing video games, and I share those moments.
author: PewDiePie

quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: I think there's something in the fact that it's hard to be good looking and funny. You have to have an oddball quality; people have to sympathise with you to find you funny.
author: Chris O'Dowd

quote: Funny things tend not to happen to me. I am not a natural comic. I need to think about things a lot before I can be even remotely amusing.
author: Rowan Atkinson

quote: Being funny with a funny voice is more my comfort zone, a broader character that I try to humanize, a kind of silly or wacky persona that I try to fill in.
author: Hank Azaria

quote: I don't know, maybe I'm immature, but I still find it funny if I dump cold water on my girlfriend when she's in the shower.
author: Daniel Tosh

quote: I'm a classic example of all humorists - only funny when I'm working.
author: Peter Sellers

quote: To all the girls out there who think being funny is not sexy, you are wrong!
author: Chad Michael Murray

quote: Isn't it funny how babies laugh a lot? I read a toddler, a young child laughs 300 times a day. The average adult laughs, like, four times a day. God put it in them. He put the laugh in us, but I think sometimes we let life get us down, you know, have bad breaks, and we lose our breaks.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Funny is funny. I dare anyone to look at Tim Conway and Harvey Korman doing the dentist sketch, which is more than 40 years old, and not scream with laughter.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I've always believed that there are funny people everywhere, but they're just not comedians. In fact, some of my best comedic inspirations were not professional entertainers.
author: Steve Martin

quote: If you tell the truth about how you're feeling, it becomes funny.
author: Larry David

quote: I've had an experience through music that has touched almost every part of me. It educated me in ways that I didn't get educated in school. So we try to lay on a bit of that, through being funny, being serious, playing hard.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: As a youngster, my mother and father always drilled into my head having something to fall back on. My father was kind of funny. I'd score 40 points. I'd come home and say, 'Look dad, I scored 40.' He'd never have a smile on his face. He'd be like, 'I saw that move you did. What if you'd hurt your knee?'
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: It's funny, because there are so many stereotypes out there about actors and movie stars in general, but I've had a great opportunity to meet a lot of them, and maybe it's just because they don't behave that way around me, but I rarely see that kind of abuse of power.
author: Ryan Reynolds

quote: Why do you have to be a nonconformist like everybody else?
author: James Thurber

quote: The funny thing about having all this so-called success is that behind it is a certain horrible emptiness.
author: Sam Shepard

quote: What other people call dark and despairing, I call funny.
author: David Sedaris

quote: I don't believe in angels, no. But I do have a wee parking angel. It's on my dashboard and you wind it up. The wings flap and it's supposed to give you a parking space. It's worked so far.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: I had been asking the universe and God to send me a way for me to help me. Show business has been so wonderful to me, and it came in the form of that. It's just so funny how things come into your life, and if you take a chance on them, it might give you a brand new life.
author: Louie Anderson

quote: Being nice can be funny. A lot of my jokes are like, 'Let me take a bad situation and try to put the best spin on it.'
author: Ron Funches

quote: We know that the nature of genius is to provide idiots with ideas twenty years later.
author: Louis Aragon

quote: When I'm being funny, I try not to offend. I don't think much of what I've done has been in really ghastly taste. I don't think I have embarrassed many people or distressed them.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: It's a funny old world.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I'm thankful enough or blessed enough to be able to say that Miles Davis was a friend when he was alive, and he was a wonderful mentor and really, really funny, you know.
author: Prince

quote: You know, it wasn't even that I'm a funny guy, I just loved stand-up comedy and I wanted to do it. It was one of the few things in my life that I knew I was going to be able to do, and I also felt as though I'd be able to do it the way I wanted to do it.
author: Bill Burr

quote: Don't send funny greeting cards on birthdays or at Christmas. Save them for funerals, when their cheery effect is needed.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: They say Yogi Berra is funny. Well, he has a lovely wife and family, a beautiful home, money in the bank, and he plays golf with millionaires. What's funny about that?
author: Casey Stengel

quote: I don't know. I think it's funny! I think it's funny! I go, what? It's so absurd. I'm alone.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: Do I like being thought of as attractive? I don't know anyone on Earth who doesn't, but I do find it funny.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: I just want to be myself and be real and be funny.
author: Bebe Rexha

quote: Whoever is my relative, I will not be nice to them.
author: George Lopez

quote: I just love carbs. And when I'm on vacation I definitely allow myself carbs, so it's always funny when people are like, 'Oh my gosh, you look great in your bikini.' I'm like, 'If you only knew what I had for breakfast!'
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: It's a weird thing. Rick Springfield wrote 'Jessie's Girl,' and he probably gets sick of talking about 'Jessie's Girl.' The thing is, I didn't write 'Blurred Lines.' I didn't direct the music video. I'm really happy for the success, but it is kind of a funny thing to follow me around.
author: Emily Ratajkowski

quote: Humor, for me, is really a gate of departure. It's a way of enticing a reader into a poem so that less funny things can take place later. It really is not an end in itself, but a means to an end.
author: Billy Collins

quote: It's funny: in the middle of making 'The Muse,' I was offered, at the time, the first 'Ice Age,' the part that Ray Romano took: I was offered the elephant. And I couldn't even stop to breathe, so I didn't do it. They've made, like, six of them. And in the animation business, for a voice actor, that's what you want. You want six, you know?
author: Albert Brooks

quote: The shooting of the guns, that was kind of funny, because rolling a cigarette and shooting a gun aren't like normal things for a 13-year old girl!
author: Hailee Steinfeld

quote: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: It usually takes two people a little while to learn where the funny buttons are and testy buttons are.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: I'm fascinated with the stories that we tell. Real histories become fantasies and fairy tales, morality tales and fables. There's something interesting and funny and perverse about the way fairytale sometimes passes for history, for truth.
author: Kara Walker

quote: So often, I read scripts and am like, 'This would never happen in real life. It's not trying to be funny. It's trying to be serious.'
author: Shailene Woodley

quote: If I ever do anything, it actually might be some fantasy elf thing or even some cute, funny thing. Just to do something a little bit out of the ordinary. I've done my superhero gig.
author: Todd McFarlane

quote: It's funny the way life works. Sometimes you go around in a weird path to find out exactly what it is that you love to do, and I'm happy that I've sort of discovered something that makes me really happy.
author: Haylie Duff

quote: When I'm with my friends I'm funny, but I don't feel like I'm a funny clown.
author: Nora Dunn

quote: That word 'funny' always makes me feel uncomfortable. Because if I were trying to be funny, I would be something like Bill Wegman - he really tries to be funny. I don't try to be funny. It's just that I feel the world is a little bit absurd and off-kilter, and I'm sort of reporting.
author: John Baldessari

quote: If I studied all my life, I couldn't think up half the number of funny things passed in one session of congress.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You can always tell when a man's well informed. His views are pretty much like your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The middle class is so funny, it's the class I know best, and it's the class where you find the most pretension, so that's what makes the middle classes so funny.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: It's hard to be funny when you have to be clean.
author: Mae West

quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: All you have in comedy, in general, is just going with your instincts. You can only hope that other people think that what you think is funny is funny. I don't have an answer but I just try to plough straight ahead.
author: Will Ferrell
