quote: Moderation is a virtue only in those who are thought to have an alternative.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: I became good friends with Jack Whitehall. I think he's great, such a great dude, and really funny.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: I wouldn't totally rule out doing Letterman or the Tonight Show if I had a set that I just happened to write that I thought was funny but was still appropriate for network censors. But I'm not going to go out of my way.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: I'm blonde and tanned and normal-sized! I'm sweet, shy, funny, have a big heart and I'm nice - and I like to eat.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: There is nothing in the world that I loathe more than group activity, that communal bath where the hairy and slippery mix in a multiplication of mediocrity.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Why don't you get out of that wet coat and into a dry martini?
author: Robert Benchley

quote: If you're public speaking, imagine yourself feeling confident; if you're nervous about a date and thinking, 'I'm gonna be a dork,' picture yourself being funny. Then it will be familiar to your brain.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Twitter is the place where I try to be more funny. And then I use Instagram just as my diary. I pull some jokes on there, but I think people have a better sense of humor on Twitter.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: If it weren't for Philo T. Farnsworth, inventor of television, we'd still be eating frozen radio dinners.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: When you write something you know, you're making a story that will work, whether or not there's bits taken. It's always funny to me when people say, 'Well, it's clearly autobiographical,' and I say, 'Well, how do you know my autobiography?' Certainly, there are things that are connected, but I just think it's a very interesting assumption.
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: A funny thing happens in real estate. When it comes back, it comes back up like gangbusters.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: I'm a funny guy. You've got to be able to make fun of yourself. We only live once.
author: Jon Pardi

quote: What bothers most critics of my work is the goofiness. One reviewer said I need to make up my mind if want to be funny or serious. My response is that I will make up my mind when God does, because life is a commingling of the sacred and the profane, good and evil. To try and separate them is fallacy.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: I always just wanted to be funny. I never really planned to be scary.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: Being effective at social media, whether for business or personal use, means capturing people who have short attention spans. They're only a click away from a picture of a funny cat, so you have to make your thing more compelling than that cat. And that can be a high bar.
author: Alexis Ohanian

quote: Every dogma has its day.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: I feel like, if there's an elephant in the room, I'd really like to start off by introducing the elephant in the room. And sometimes it's funny.
author: Louis Theroux

quote: With improv, it's a combination of listening and not trying to be funny.
author: Kristen Wiig

quote: At home in L.A., Sunday is lazy. It's the wife and me lying in bed with coffee, watching 'The Soup' or something funny on TiVo. The kid will occasionally join us. Eventually, breakfast is at a place down the street called Paty's. And we always have some kind of great dinner - my wife makes a great roast beef.
author: Eric McCormack

quote: I tend to head for what's amusing because a lot of things aren't happy. But usually you can find a funny side to practically anything.
author: Maggie Smith

quote: I do quite like sightseeing. I like churches, museums, galleries and all that stuff. I love the smell of a church in Italy or the smell of an old greasy spoon somewhere. I like markets and little funny shops in the backstreets of Florence.
author: Ashley Jensen

quote: I'm somebody who believes in funny things, and laughing, but I do like for them to come from a place that addresses the human condition.
author: Natasha Lyonne

quote: I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: I am a candid interview and I have a dark and dry sense of humor - a very Canadian sense of humor and I am only learning now stupidly that you can't read tongue. When I say something funny in a newspaper and I meant it to be funny, it doesn't read that way.
author: Michael Buble

quote: I don't know if I'm embarrassed because I think it's a funny show, but I could imagine there being a snootiness about it, but I do find 'The Big Bang Theory' very funny. I think that's a good show. I think it's fun, I like the actors; I think they're all doing a great job.
author: Stephen Merchant

quote: If you're talking about Java in particular, Python is about the best fit you can get amongst all the other languages. Yet the funny thing is, from a language point of view, JavaScript has a lot in common with Python, but it is sort of a restricted subset.
author: Guido van Rossum

quote: I find being funny very hard work. I am always asked about it, and I feel guilty saying that, but it's the truth. I love my work, but it ain't easy.
author: Madeline Kahn

quote: A stockbroker urged me to buy a stock that would triple its value every year. I told him, 'At my age, I don't even buy green bananas.'
author: Claude Pepper

quote: It's funny how the ruthless, murderous gangster has really been romanticized by the media. I mean, I grew up watching the 'Godfathers' and 'Scarface,' and they were the coolest. They're just really interesting stories with great characters. They're rock stars.
author: Elena Satine

quote: Everyone has at least one story, and each of us is funny if we admit it. You have to admit you're the funniest person you've ever heard of.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The 'Billionaire' song is what my kids tease me with. They sing it to me. It's funny.
author: Bill Gates

quote: It is even harder for the average ape to believe that he has descended from man.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I'm screamingly funny, you know, I really am in the books. And that helps because I'm funnier than a lot of people, I think, and that's appreciated by young people.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: It's funny the way most people love the dead. Once you are dead, you are made for life.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: TV is chewing gum for the eyes.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Brought up to respect the conventions, love had to end in marriage. I'm afraid it did.
author: Bette Davis

quote: I detest jokes - when somebody tells me one, I feel my IQ dropping; the brain cells start to disappear. But something is funny when the person delivering the line doesn't know it's funny or doesn't treat it as a joke. Maybe it comes from a place of truth, or it's a sort of rage against society.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: I read the script for Wonder Boys, and I said that was almost perfect, it was so classy, cool and funny. It's a really specific thing. We stuck to it, it turned out good and a lot of people liked it.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: Being a humorist is not a voluntary thing. You can tell this because in a situation where saying a funny thing will cause a lot of trouble, a humorist will still say the funny thing. No matter how inappropriate.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I can speak Esperanto like a native.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: You can do anything with bayonets except sit on them.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: I love practical jokes and humor. That there's frankly no joke that I don't think is funny. I love practical jokes, but I don't like being scared.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I never smoked. I never drank and I never took drugs. The funny thing is, nothing is more boring, people like this. For me, it's OK. But most of my friends, at least they smoke and drink.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: We try to make the name longer and longer every year. First, it was 'Larry the Cable Guy's Christmas Spectacular.' Then it was 'It's a Very Larry Christmas.' Now it's 'Larry the Cable Guy's Hula-palooza Christmas Luau.' I'll tell you what it is: It's funny. That's what it is. Who cares what the name of it is? It is a funny special.
author: Larry the Cable Guy

quote: At the end of the day it's got to be a good movie, it's got to be a funny movie, and it's got to make people think, 'Hey, I couldn't have spent my time any better.'
author: Tom Hanks

quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: It's funny, when bands or younger musicians ask me: 'So, what does it take to make it?' Well, first explain to me what you mean by 'making it': Do you want to be a rock star or do you want music to be your livelihood?
author: Eddie Van Halen

quote: People think it's funny that I enjoy dreaming so much. I just use it as a form of entertainment. It's very private. I don't see my dreams as separate. I mean, half the time I'm wandering around dreaming anyway.
author: Robert Smith

quote: To me, what separates a funny movie from a good movie is something personal.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: As soon as I realized you could be funny as a job, that was the job I wanted.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: Every now and then, when I think about it, I think, 'What would I even talk about onstage?' It's never been, 'I wonder if I'm funny. I wonder if I can come up with jokes.' It's more, 'What would it be like without the leather suit and the anger?'
author: Eddie Murphy

quote: I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: I find what I do for a living really funny. I mean, acting is kind of a hilarious thing for a grown man to call a job.
author: Christian Bale

quote: I have an all-Japanese design team, and none of them speak English. So it's often funny and surprising how my ideas end up lost in translation.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: With TV, you just have to finish the days and get the episodes out. And it's always going to be an impossible schedule. That's the funny thing with TV that not a lot of people realize.
author: Dylan O'Brien

quote: Always remember your kid's name. Always remember where you put your kid. Don't let your kid drive until their feet can reach the pedals. Use the right size diapers... for yourself. And, when in doubt, make funny faces.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: I like to make jokes; I consider myself a funny person. I just think making jokes about people who are in a situation beyond their control is not funny to them or their families.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day.
author: Jay Leno

quote: I've always liked older women. One sad thing about being my age is that there are no older women. I used to amuse my mother's friends even at five or six with witty turns of phrase. Somehow, I just knew how to be funny.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: Here is my prescription to heal all wounds. Watch the film 'Funny Girl' at least five times, eat at least 45 chocolate bars, and hang out with all those friends you blew off to hang out with your ex. I truly believe that, through a combination of Nutella, old pals and Barbra Streisand, we can achieve happiness and, very probably, world peace.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: I always felt that it was easier to take a funny person and teach them to write television than to take somebody who was a television writer and make them funny. And I discovered a lot of great writers that went on to do a lot of great shows like 'Seinfeld,' 'Friends,' you know, 'Three and a Half Men.'
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: Regardless of what I do, whether I write a book or whether I act or whether I host, I'll always do stand-up comedy because those moments, that's what I crave. If I do something funny, and I hear a crowd laugh in that moment, we're all sharing the exact same experience and the exact same feeling.
author: Howie Mandel

quote: I never thought of myself as like, a funny person.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: I'm usually always very happy and funny and positive. It's only when I'm tired that I get a little low energy.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: That's a funny thing, fame. People definitely do treat you differently. When you begin to be successful, people say, 'Don't go changing.' Well, that's easy to say, but the fact is, you don't change at all - other people do.
author: Jonathan Rhys Meyers

quote: I've been fascinated by the Internet from the very start. In 2001, I had made a funny black-and-white film called 'How to Dance Properly,' a short video of me dancing to a Madonna song. I sent it to 17 of my friends on a Thursday, and by Monday, one million people a day were logging on to view it.
author: Ze Frank

quote: Experience is a funny thing. You don't always have it when you need it.
author: Patrick Chan

quote: I get asked, 'Who would you really like to work with?' I'm already working with them. Smart, talented, funny people, good musicians, an extended family, good friends.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: That's my main flaw: I always think authority figures or my boss is going to think something I do is funny. And usually they don't.
author: Jimmy Kimmel

quote: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I don't think of myself as a comedian, but as an artist, a scientist and chemist who just happens to be funny. I started doing stand-up to add another level to my game. I feel that I'm a young rookie with a veteran's skill.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: I started by doing a little funny story, and then I started going to open mics. I realized I had a lot of work to do - you have to get over the stage fright and get your stage presence up. It took me some time, but I finally feel that I'm at a point where I feel comfortable on stage and giving my point of view.
author: Loni Love

quote: I'm inspired by people who are unapologetically themselves, from Bill Cosby to Fahim Anwar. Just funny people.
author: Jerrod Carmichael

quote: Sometimes, comics will make the observation that it's not jokes that are funny, it's characters that are funny. And isn't that true! That's why I always kill jokes. I'm terrible at them, because I get the joke right, but I can't get the character right, and it just goes down like a lead balloon.
author: David Mitchell

quote: I've always said that instead of watching a guy juggle seven things amazingly I would rather see a really bad juggler who's really funny.
author: Jeff Dunham

quote: Films are big hits when they touch a lot of people. Things are not funny in a vacuum, they're funny because we respond to some personal dislocation, some embarrassment, some humiliation, some pain we've suffered, or some desire we have.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: Things that I feel really sad about, I talk about. That way, if it's funny, it doesn't hurt anymore.
author: Pete Davidson

quote: Some of my fans don't really like it when I respond to people who say things that are trying to be hurtful on social media. But I think it's kind of funny. There's a lot of things that make me laugh, that people would try and say those things. I mean, there's some that I can't even retweet or respond to just because of how bad it is.
author: Rickie Fowler

quote: The fact is I'm choosy, but mainly about a man's character. He has to be interesting, funny and clever. I don't even mind if he's not very good-looking.
author: Agyness Deyn

quote: 'Hustle' is wonderfully enjoyable because all my life, I've made an effort to be with people who can make me laugh. That original cast - Marc Warren, Jaime Murray, Robert Glenister and Adrian Lester - are all funny. So I know every day I'll have a few good laughs.
author: Robert Vaughn

quote: I was not particularly bright, I wasn't very athletic, I was a little too tall, odd, funny looking, I was just really weird as a kid.
author: Uma Thurman

quote: I'm very lighthearted, outgoing, friendly, and funny, so I like to try new things.
author: Chandler Parsons

quote: Defy your own group. Rebel against yourself.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: You'll hear 'Hippie,' or, 'Get a haircut.' I like it. I think it's funny because they think we've never heard that before. So, like, good one.
author: Jacob deGrom

quote: I think I'm too cynical for L.A. My sense of humor doesn't go down well here, which probably affects my love life. I need to have a laugh track following me around so people know I'm trying to be funny.
author: Teddy Thompson

quote: I play a female Indiana Jones, a professor who hunts down precious objects, like a bowl that belonged to the Buddha. They tailored the role to me: I wanted to be smart, funny, and to kick some ass.
author: Tia Carrere

quote: Objectifying is kind of a funny thing. Art is objectification, all art, because you're taking someone and making them into an object. But people can also talk back more to you when you're sketching them. They can look at you and say, 'Oh man, you got me wrong.'
author: Molly Crabapple

quote: The funny thing about history is that we imagine that people didn't laugh in the old days, but of course they did, at stupid things.
author: Terry Jones

quote: During the Great Depression, when people laughed their worries disappeared. Audiences loved these funny men. I decided to become one.
author: Jerry Stiller

quote: My dad was in the army so we moved around a lot and I changed schools every year and had to make new friends, and I found that if I was the funny guy I could do that easier.
author: Jason Gann

quote: What after all, is a halo? It's only one more thing to keep clean.
author: Christopher Fry

quote: Being mean just for being mean's sake isn't funny.
author: Kaitlin Olson

quote: What has been happening more lately - of course, I also put in my bio, I say I do the voice of Goliath, but some people go - you know, I say something, and it's a funny thing when you work in this business, people will talk out loud in front of you like you're not there.
author: Keith David

quote: Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine.
author: Christopher Plummer

quote: Pretty people don't keep comedies on the air. Funny people keep comedies on the air.
author: Allison Jones

quote: It's a funny thing when you think you're dead. You're not terrified of it anymore. There's a sort of a epiphany to religious thing; it's not sort of church-based, but you end up with a serenity which you didn't have before, and I just simply enjoy it. It really does sound stupid, but I've got to tell you it's made my life.
author: David Lange

quote: Some characters think more like me than others; some think more like my dad or someone else. It certainly is made up of my experiences, things I've heard, things I think are funny, things I think are sad. There's sort of a strange, blurry version of yourself in there.
author: Watt Key

quote: I guess the producers saw me and knew I was literate and I always tried to be alert and it's funny because you have to have a sharpness to do those shows, especially some of the ones I did in later years.
author: June Lockhart

quote: If you're serious, you really understand that it's important that you laugh as much as possible and admit that you're the funniest person you ever met. You have to laugh. Admit that you're funny. Otherwise, you die in solemnity.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If I had to live my life over, I'd live over a saloon.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Fashions have done more harm than revolutions.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I'd love to date somebody cool, fun, funny.
author: Rihanna

quote: I always find it actually funny that the analysis is that the characters I play in comedies are the manchild, the adolescent, characters that refuse to grow up. And yet, if you look back in the history of comedy all the way back to the Marx brothers, that's a big part of comedy.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: I have only been funny about seventy four per cent of the time. Yes I think that is right. Seventy-four per cent of the time.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: I know what Germans are. They are a funny people. They are always choosing someone to lead them in a direction which they do not want to go.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: I could sooner reconcile all Europe than two women.
author: Louis XIV

quote: There's a lot more to me than just funny.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: I gave a funny speech at my wife's birthday party, and I'm thinking, 'Hey, I've still got it.'
author: Larry David

quote: You see much more of your children once they leave home.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: One of the things I like about acting is that, in a funny way, I come back to myself.
author: Bill Murray

quote: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand.
author: Emo Philips

quote: There is hope for the future because God has a sense of humor and we are funny to God.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.
author: Josh Billings

quote: I used to love being the class clown. I loved to make jokes and make people laugh. There was a set of students who would find it funny. But the cool students were like, 'Eeew!'
author: Issa Rae

quote: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.
author: Issa Rae

quote: I used to stutter really badly. Everybody thinks it's funny. And it's not funny. It's not.
author: Joe Biden

quote: It's funny how people who ain't never been down there can think that America is so fair and that we should be alright. It's funny that the people who have their foot on our neck are telling us, 'Get up. What's wrong with you?'
author: Ice Cube

quote: It's a funny feeling to work with people who you consider your colleagues and to realize that they actually are young enough to be your children.
author: Alan Alda

quote: How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: I don't do it often, but I do cry. I also laugh a lot; people tell me I'm funny and I do like to laugh.
author: Michael Caine

quote: I'm an unorthodox type of guy, a funny guy - at least I think I'm funny. And one of the things I like to do is come up with nicknames for myself.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: I like funny girls.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: You know being relevant or coming up with something interesting, funny to say about what's current is just as hard as it might ever be depending on the serendipity of it all.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: I have kind of a funny relationship with movies. I don't have to see the whole movie to get an impression of it or to let it have an influence on me.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: I have no idea what I'm going to say when I stand up to give a toast. But I do know that anything I say I find funny.
author: Don Rickles

quote: Chris Hemsworth is like Christopher Reeve in that he can do two things: he can wear a big red cape without a shred of self-consciousness. But he's also funny as hell, and he's so sweet. So with all the fish-out-of-water stuff, he's so funny. So he does almost two jobs in a way.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: We all know how funny Morrissey is. Actually, you know what? I say that sarcastically. His songs are some of the funniest songs I've ever heard in my life. I mean, really. I mean, not that the 'Girlfriend in a Coma' is, like, really funny.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: Latinos, Asians, African-Americans, women - we're all trying to find our place in this world of cinema and television and theater. And the great thing with comedy is that most of the time, you could be orange. It doesn't matter, as long you're funny.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: Usually, if I think something is really funny, I'm not gonna test it. I'll just test it when I'm onstage.
author: Donald Glover

quote: The one thing you shouldn't do is try to tell a cab driver how to get somewhere.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Japanese people have a funny habit of abbreviating names.
author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quote: Progress was all right. Only it went on too long.
author: James Thurber

quote: I love Adele. Adele is my favorite artist. She's British. She's funny. She's just an amazing, incredible voice, and I love to sing as well.
author: Millie Bobby Brown

quote: Actually I never did stand up. I'm not that funny.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: Harry Reid is not funny; he's creepy. Nancy Pelosi is creepy. Charles Schumer is sneaky and creepy.
author: Lewis Black

quote: I guess when I think about it, one of the things I like to dramatise, and what is sometimes funny, is someone coming unglued. I don't consider myself someone who is making the argument that I support these choices. I just think it can be funny.
author: Wes Anderson

quote: The funny thing is that when you have any form of presentation to your band, meaning you have the foresight to see outside of your creativity, you have a bigger vision.
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: I've never met a funny person who wasn't smart. I've met a lot of dramatic people who were stupid. But I've never met a funny person who wasn't smart.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: I cannot sing, dance or act; what else would I be but a talk show host.
author: David Letterman

quote: From my perspective, probably women are won over by people who are sweet and respectful and courteous and kind and funny. I think those are the things that win women over.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I read that John Hughes script for 'Mr. Mom,' and I thought, 'This guy is a funny writer.' I went: 'You ought to stick around and direct this thing.' But he didn't; he left, and look what he became. A really legendary comedy director.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: I love things made out of animals. It's just so funny to think of someone saying, 'I need a letter opener. I guess I'll have to kill a deer.
author: David Sedaris

quote: I like funny guys and those, for some reason, tend to be nerdy guys.
author: Megan Fox

quote: I was going through a little bit of turbulence in my career. And so, it's funny how turbulence itself will make you hold onto something for security. And so the only thing I knew is trust in the Lord and lean not unto your own heart, in all thy ways acknowledge him and he shall direct thy path.
author: Emmitt Smith

quote: What am I responsible for? Who am I responsible to? Everybody? How come when Archie Bunker nailed everybody, it was funny - but when I do it, it's not?
author: Sam Kinison

quote: Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you; she is after your barn.
author: Hesiod

quote: I was the kind nobody thought could make it. I had a funny Boston accent. I couldn't pronounce my R's. I wasn't a beauty.
author: Barbara Walters

quote: It's funny how the hippies and the punks tried to get rid of the conservatives, but they always seem to get the upper hand in the end.
author: Bjork

quote: For a Catholic kid in parochial school, the only way to survive the beatings - by classmates, not the nuns - was to be the funny guy.
author: George A. Romero

quote: It's funny when you follow your own sort of bliss, then other people tend to respond in kind, meaning audiences. It's really weird how that works, but it does seem to apply to 'Nancy & Beth' especially.
author: Megan Mullally

quote: I didn't plan to be the rude middle-class comedian. You write a certain type of joke that you find funny, and mine happen to be often rude. Yes, it's juvenile, but that's me.
author: Jimmy Carr

quote: The only way I was going to be funny was if I was myself, and either you liked it, or you didn't. Either you got on my train, or you didn't. Freeing myself of this idea that I had to fit a certain mold was when I was able to be my funniest.
author: Aisha Tyler

quote: A dear friend of my early childhood has worked as an anthropologist in Papua New Guinea for much of her life, and from the tiny island where her main work has been focused, she has brought me many funny and beautiful stories over the years.
author: Michael Leunig

quote: Sometimes I can't believe I'm going to be 60. I always say there's no point moaning about getting older, when there's nothing you can do about it. But still, I do find it quite funny. I look at that number, 60, and I think, 'Really? Me?'
author: Twiggy

quote: My wife has a slight impediment in her speech. Every now and then she stops to breathe.
author: Jimmy Durante

quote: As funny as some photos can be, think twice about allowing yourself to be tagged in questionable photos.
author: Lewis Howes

quote: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
author: Robert Orben

quote: After the Soviet Union collapsed, people thought I wasn't funny anymore.
author: Yakov Smirnoff

quote: Old white guys can be a funny bunch, can't they? The same anti-same-sex marriage, anti-affirmative action cadre can flower into the biggest supporters of 'equality' the minute they get a whiff of minority empowerment.
author: John Ridley

quote: An idea isn't responsible for the people who believe in it.
author: Don Marquis

quote: People say funny things all the time during really serious moments in life.
author: Mark Ruffalo

quote: What most readers do not realize is that it takes a particular genius to write funny, to satirize.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: Sometimes you have to take the focus off of you and put it on someone else and it's funny what you can accomplish and how much strength you really have.
author: Hoda Kotb

quote: It's funny how seeing a love story never gets boring, because it's the dream, isn't it? It's the dream to have a true connection with another human being.
author: Felicity Jones

quote: It's a required part of your film history to know who Woody is. His movies are so wonderful, and not just funny but so insightful about human behavior.
author: Scarlett Johansson

quote: When I write, I'm not trying to be funny. It's the way I look at the world.
author: Billy Collins

quote: 'Funny People' is my favorite performance of myself to date. Even though it's a comedy and there are serious moments, I really felt like Leo felt like a real person. It didn't feel like I was playing myself. Whether it's a comedy or drama, I just try to make it as realistic as possible.
author: Jonah Hill

quote: I like to play music, and I like to be funny, so I just do both at the same time.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: My sister and I - she's a musician - we jam all the time. We always play around for giggles with stuff that seem unconventional or stuff that seems funny. A lot of the stuff sometimes is just a response from jam sessions in her room, so she'll be on the guitar or the keyboard, and we'll just start singing and doing stuff.
author: Andra Day

quote: It's funny how God will change your plans for you when he's ready.
author: Brett Young

quote: Having a solo career is a funny thing.
author: Daryl Hall

quote: The surprising thing is that I was not funny in high school. I was always jealous of the funny kids because they always got the girls. I couldn't tell a joke to save my life.
author: Seann William Scott

quote: I have no agenda except to be funny. Neither I or the writers profess to offer any worldly wisdom.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Back in the '70s, like one of my favorite movies ever was 'The Bad News Bears', and that was a kids' movie, but I don't think of it that way. I think of it as just a great movie because Walter Matthau was so funny and so harsh with those kids.
author: Jack Black

quote: It's funny how I use social media because I don't use it to promote my restaurants that much. I use it for social issues and I think that's what it's for. I do a few things - I mess around with music a lot because that's a passion of mine. If something strikes me and I want to share it, I do.
author: Tom Colicchio

quote: 'I Love You, Man' was kind of funny.
author: Ethan Coen

quote: I love nerds. Comic-Con junkies are the tastemakers of tomorrow. Isn't that funny? The tables have turned.
author: Kristen Bell

quote: I don't have a bank account because I don't know my mother's maiden name.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: But with comedy it's a simple premise. If it's funny, people laugh. If it's not, they don't.
author: Steve Coogan

quote: The fact that I'm shouting that I have Gangnam style makes people crack up. Imagine if Brad Pitt was singing the song - would it be funny? A twist is important when it comes to writing lyrics.
author: Psy

quote: But a funny thing happened four years later. I was invited to play for an alumni team against the Red Wings.
author: Ted Lindsay

quote: My wife's a loving, funny, Irish-spirited person, and I'm still surprised at some of the things she says. She makes me laugh every day.
author: Gary Sinise

quote: Funny is a good foil. Humor is illuminating, and it also gives you power.
author: J. Tillman

quote: I love improv so much. Listening. I think that's the key. When you improvise, you put a lot of pressure on yourself to create, and to be generating information, and trying to be funny, but if you just listen to what's being said to you, and then react honestly, you generally get better results.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: It all started when my dog began getting free roll over minutes.
author: Jay London

quote: All you can do is really the prep work and make sure you're ready to hit each golf shot. Outside of that, you're not sure really what's going to happen. It's a funny game, but I think that's why I love it. You never know, one day to the next; you could go shoot 62, and the next day you're going to shoot 78, and you can't predict it.
author: Rickie Fowler

quote: I don't believe that anybody has come to a conclusion on why something is funny. It's funny because it's ridiculous and it's ridiculous for different reasons at different times.
author: Jackie Mason

quote: It's funny: I always, as a high school teacher and particularly as a high school yearbook teacher, because yearbook staffs are 90 percent female, I got to sit in and overhear teenage girl talk for many years. I like teenage girls; I like their drama, their foibles. And I think, 'I'll be good with a teenage daughter!'
author: Rob Thomas

quote: There are some situations in life that are simply not funny, and there's nothing funny about them, but they're rare, and they don't last all that long.
author: Kenneth Lonergan

quote: I loved cartoons as a kid, and so many funny moments in animation for me are nonverbal sounds, unarticulated mouth noise.
author: Alan Tudyk

quote: I don't need to convince anybody that I know kung fu, but maybe somebody needs to know that I really can act, without doing a Chinese accent or a funny walk.
author: David Carradine

quote: I've dated some women who have turned me on to some funny things that are strange for men to actually do, but these things have become part of my process. I think the things I do for my appearance help make me look better. I even colour my hair because I like how it makes me look.
author: Ryan Seacrest

quote: When you're doing a medieval show like 'Pillars,' it starts off a bit like a school play. You're all in funny costumes; you've had your coffee, and you say, 'Good morning'. Then you go on set and, if you've got good actors and directors, it takes on a life of its own.
author: Ian McShane

quote: I think the amazing thing about 'Twin Peaks' was that it completely changed television from that point forward. It showed everyone that you can just sit really quiet with storylines and characters. It can be scary, it can be uncomfortable, it can be weirdly funny.
author: Madchen Amick

quote: I'm a prankster, so some of the - you know, I like a good joke. I think when it's funny, it's funny.
author: Sean Spicer

quote: There's not one thing that inspires me the most. Me and my friends joke around with each other and hang out so much that whatever makes us laugh really hard makes it into 'Workaholics.' But the characters that I think are funny are guys that are confidently stupid.
author: Adam DeVine

quote: It's a real primal thing, watching someone get hurt. It's funny and accessible.
author: Johnny Knoxville

quote: I'm doing a pilot for Comedy Central with the band Steel Panther. They're faux heavy metal. They started as kind of a tribute band out here, or a cover band, and they're funny guys, and they just sort of morphed into their own thing.
author: Brian Posehn

quote: When I turned about 12 or 13, I realised that being funny wasn't about remembering jokes. It was about creating them.
author: Paul Merton

quote: It's funny because I want my teeth to be, like, neon 'Real Housewives' white, but mine have stopped taking to teeth whitening. When I talk to my dentist, I'm like, 'They can be that white,' and he's like, 'Veneers can be that white.'
author: Christine Teigen

quote: I remember listening to the radio as a kid and finding that the songs always made me feel more peaceful. Funny, but the more hurtin' the music was, the better it made me feel. I think of that now when I write my songs. I may not be feelin' the blues myself, but I'm writing them for other people who have a hard life.
author: Chris Isaak

quote: It's a funny thing because I don't want to wish away my privacy. Do I want 'Terminator Genisys' to explode? Absolutely. Do I want to take my career to the next level? Absolutely? You have to trade some things for that. It's all about how you conduct yourself and what you make of the experience.
author: Jai Courtney

quote: I love New York. I was sad, depressed and incredibly moved by our fellow countrymen and what they've done. I wanted to give people a chance to see something funny, have a distraction.
author: Ben Stiller

quote: It's funny, in literature no one ever goes to the lavatory.
author: Tom Baker

quote: Comedy is still alive, and there are still funny people. Jews are still overrepresented in comedy and psychiatry and underrepresented in the priesthood. That immigrant Jewish humor is still with us.
author: Robert Klein

quote: The importance of satire is bringing more people to the table. There are a lot of average citizens who aren't interested in politics and would be more interested if it's brought to them in a comedic, funny, satirical way.
author: Bassem Youssef

quote: Sex is funny and love is serious.
author: Stephan Jenkins

quote: Memory is funny. Once you hit a vein the problem is not how to remember but how to control the flow.
author: Tobias Wolff

quote: Chess is a thinking person's game. But you don't have to be smart to know what's funny! Lots of check, mate!
author: Steve Breen

quote: I was taught that you can't be a healthy individual without art, music, or nature in your life. All my art is tied into inner cultural experience. It has to do with music or ceremonies or nature, even the funny ones.
author: Michael Horse

quote: My father was a really funny guy. He lived a good long life. And he was the reason I wanted to be funny and become a comedian and a comedy writer, so to say that he's somewhat of a mythic figure in my life would be an understatement.
author: Carol Leifer

quote: Well, I did Marlene 15 years ago and that's in the style. It's somehow similar and not similar because Marlene was much more aggressive, funny and sad.
author: Maximilian Schell

quote: When I was in New York, I got to see Joan Rivers do an hour of material, and it blew my mind. I don't remember how old she was at the time, but she just had this edgy hour that had so much funny stuff in it, and she was so fearless. If you only watch her on the red carpet, you don't get a sense of what a legendary standup comedian she is.
author: Chelsea Peretti

quote: I think it's harder to go from comedy to drama than from drama to comedy. Seeing you dramatic all the time, they crave to see you being silly or funny. But, seeing you in comedy all the time, it's hard to see that person go be serious, for some reason.
author: Evan Peters

quote: Funny you mention my dinner parties when I have just suggested that inviting close friends over to share a meal with candlelight and wine at your table could be a form of religious experience for some people. To me it's a form of sacrament.
author: Sally Quinn

quote: I like drama. I love being in a drama where I get to be the funny guy. That's what I really love the most.
author: John Leguizamo

quote: It's funny, I listen to friends who talk about back when they were 14, eight, 16, whatever, as if it was yesterday. Me, I've no idea what I did. It's all a blur, I'm afraid.
author: Catherine McCormack

quote: My company is known for being funny as well as moving. You get a bit of everything in these shows. I think people know they're going to have a surprising experience.
author: Matthew Bourne

quote: I wake up every day and look at my own ugly mug in the mirror and don't think twice about it. The fact that other people might want to look at me still feels funny. It's flattering, but funny.
author: Luke Bracey

quote: I never saw myself as a comedian. I saw myself as a guy who can act funny.
author: Charlie Day

quote: Any good humor is sophomoric. 'Sophomoric' is the liberal word for funny.
author: Michael O'Donoghue

quote: One man is as good as another until he has written a book.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: It's funny, because I've never thought of myself as a Hispanic actor, like in 'American Gangster,' I'm playing an Italian. I've always been fortunate enough to have been allowed to play all these diverse roles.
author: Yul Vazquez

quote: Well, life is dark, isn't it? Mostly, it's dreadful. At the same time, death is funny too. I mean, look at the fuss we make of it.
author: Upamanyu Chatterjee

quote: I just recently joined Twitter. It's very positive - I love all the accolades. If my ego is hurting, I can just open my Twitter account and see 'Oh, I love you! I love the show!' and it's great. I'm trying to find the balance between trying to be funny, being honest and just being a promoter as the guy on 'Royal Pains.'
author: Mark Feuerstein

quote: So to me, Texas Hold 'em puts me to sleep. At least when you play stud, you can be funny as you deal. Somebody some day is going to come up with a Stud show that's going to work.
author: Joseph Bologna

quote: Porsche is a driver's car - a performance car. That was funny - here's this awesome car, but it's got no cup holders.
author: Jason McCoy

quote: All my life, I always wanted to be somebody. Now I see that I should have been more specific.
author: Jane Wagner

quote: My mother was against me being an actress - until I introduced her to Frank Sinatra.
author: Angie Dickinson

quote: What's funny is my mom took me to the theater for the first time when I was six years old, and I was just amazed by it. I just said, 'Hey Mom, can I do this too?' And so she signed me up for little theater classes, and I remember my first audition for a play when I was seven years old was for 'The Thankful Elf.'
author: Dana Davis

quote: My eyes are different sizes, my nose is too broad at the bridge and squishes up when I laugh, and my lips are sorta funny when I smile.
author: Terry Farrell

quote: It's funny how it usually works out that I end up dying. It sort of works out, because by the time I die, I'm usually tired of working on that particular movie, so I look forward to it.
author: Owen Wilson

quote: I think Irish women are strong as horses, incredibly loyal and for the most part, funny, witty, bright and optimistic in the face of devastating reality.
author: Fionnula Flanagan

quote: Let's make some funny pictures.
author: Tex Avery

quote: A man's got to take a lot of punishment to write a really funny book.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Like almost everyone who uses e-mail, I receive a ton of spam every day. Much of it offers to help me get out of debt or get rich quick. It would be funny if it weren't so exciting.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Whatever is funny is subversive, every joke is ultimately a custard pie... a dirty joke is a sort of mental rebellion.
author: George Orwell

quote: I don't mean to be funny.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I had an idea of what I thought was funny. It's kind of based on how I am.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I think they should have a Barbie with a buzz cut.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I remember straightening my hair because I wanted to be like everybody else, and now the fact that anybody would emulate what I do? It's just funny.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: I like marriage. The idea.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: I grew up in a funny way.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Comedy is learning to be funny, and you learn to be funny in small rooms with young audiences.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I think anyone who's perfectly happy isn't particularly funny.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: It is funny to me that because I can run, because I'm athletic, people tend to see that as my only asset.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: I love readings and my readers, but the din of voices of the audience gives me stage fright, and the din of voices inside whisper that I am a fraud, and that the jig is up. Surely someone will rise up from the audience and say out loud that not only am I not funny and helpful, but I'm annoying, and a phony.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: It is really funny when people say you'd be obvious for a great villain.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: There's always going to be someone as funny as you or funnier.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: James Caan told me at the end of filming 'Elf' that he had been waiting through the whole film for me to be funny - and I never was.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: It's funny, because what happens to me when I read a script, when something grabs hold of me, I start getting these flashes of people or places or things or images.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: My mum passing away wasn't funny, but that funeral and what I went through, the things that happened, looking back at it, there were funny moments. You have to be strong enough to look back at it, to sit and assess the situation.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: The two things in the world we all share in this world are laughter and pain. We've all got problems. The levels of those problems vary, but we've all got problems. When you can take things that are painful and make them funny, that's a gift - to you and your audience.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: He was like a cock who thought the sun had risen to hear him crow.
author: George Eliot

quote: Boy, those French: they have a different word for everything!
author: Steve Martin

quote: I think it's funny to be delicate with subjects that are explosive.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I don't need you to be funny. I don't want to be entertained.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I didn't understand key signatures or anything, you know. I'd say silly things at the top of a trumpet part like, 'Note, when you play B naturals, make the B naturals a half step lower because they sound funny if they're B naturals.' And some guy said: 'Idiot, just put a flat on the third line and it's a key signature, you know?'
author: Quincy Jones

quote: It's funny what a few no-hitters do for a body.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: As a small child, I could watch anything happen and tell a story, and it was funny.
author: Ron White

quote: I was born in Paris in the mid-1960s, and by the time I was 12 I had started going to the movies by myself. Most of the movies of that period never appealed to me. I didn't like the 'naturalism,' the sad or the 'down-to-earth' characters. What I wanted from film was fantasy, dreams, funny situations, extravagant decor - and beautiful women.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
author: Josh Billings

quote: I liked comedy as a kid. When I was a kid, I'd go to sleep to, like, Bill Cosby albums every night. I'd listen to 'Bill Cosby Is A Very Funny Fellow... Right!' and 'Wonderfulness,' which are two of his most famous albums. Then the next night, I'd flip them over, 'cause it was the old stackable turntable.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: There are certain sorts of jokes which have only to do with the substitution of the unexpected word in a familiar context. If you translated something into French and then had it translated back into English by somebody who didn't know the original, you'd lose what was funny.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Books are funny little portable pieces of thought.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Without hurting anybody, we all tend to laugh at others' discomfort. When someone slips on a banana skin and falls it's funny.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: The men I idolized built their bodies and became somebody - like Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger - and I thought, 'That can be me.' So I started working out. The funny thing is I didn't realize back then that I was having a defining moment.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: It's funny about men and women. Men pay in cash to get them and pay in cash to get rid of them. Women pay emotionally coming and going. Neither has it easy.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Stand up is really fun because if I think of a joke or a funny idea, then I can just go and tell some people and if they laugh, they laugh right away.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I do come across people who don't like me, don't like my comedy, don't think it's funny, it's too cutesy, or whatever they hate. And it's like, 'Okay. That's your opinion. Somebody liked it, so that's good.' Hopefully it balances out.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: A lot of newspaper columns used to be written in a rat-a-tat-tat, fast-paced style - and they tended to be funny. They were a little relief from the grimmer, grayer parts of the newspaper, and one of the best people at doing this was Will Rogers.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My whole family can talk. They are all car salesmen. They are all funny.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I like to have fun, but I don't think of myself as being funny. But I'm a big jokester, so I make fun of myself a lot!
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: I'm not funny in person. I mean I'm really not. I'm one of those people who always screw up anecdotes.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: In a funny way, nothing makes you feel more like a native of your own country than to live where nearly everyone is not.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: I wasn't close to my father, but I wanted to be all my life. He had a funny sense of humor, and he laughed all the time - good and loud, like I do. He was a gay Irish gentleman and very good-looking. And he wanted to be close to me, too, but we never had much time together.
author: Judy Garland

quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: I'm a Twitter addict. Jose Andres is a serial tweeter. It's funny to see which chefs have embraced it, and the different paths they take.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: I just like the continue doing what I've been doing. A melange of funny, straight drama, television, movies, a little theater here and there wouldn't hurt. So if I can keep doing that, I'll be a very happy person.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: It's a funny show. The characters are surprisingly likable, given how ugly they are. We've got this huge cast of characters that we can move around. And over the last few seasons, we've explored some of the secondary characters' personal lives a bit more.
author: Matt Groening

quote: I think when 'The Simpsons' first came on, there was an uproar. People got used to it. They realized the show's really funny, it's got a heart, so I think it's pretty safe.
author: Matt Groening

quote: I never looked at myself as the fat sister. Sometimes I would beat people to the punch and say, 'Oh I'm the fat, funny one,' because that's what people would say about me. But I never really thought that.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: It sounds funny, but I always try to keep an open mind about what I'm writing about. Sometimes I squeak my opinions in there, but generally I don't. I try to be objective about things that I'm writing about.
author: John Mellencamp

quote: Your name is a funny thing. It stands for what you're about, and everything I do is really about pride.
author: Tom Ford

quote: How can you analyse what is funny? What's funny to one isn't funny to another... What's funny to you is a personal thing.
author: Les Dawson

quote: I'm on so late I'm definitely the last seconds of anyone's attention. So I just want to give them something dumb to laugh at, so they go, 'That's funny,' then fall asleep.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: The people I grew up around who I really liked were quick on the draw. It always just wowed me. And my mum would make weird funny comments. I can see in myself her self-deprecating, hippie humour. I can't take myself too seriously.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: So, where's the Cannes Film Festival being held this year?
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: When I was a little kid, I wrote this play about all these characters living in a haunted house. There was a witch who lived there, and a mummy. When they were all hassling him, this guy who bought the house - I can't believe I remember this - he said to them, 'Who's paying the mortgage on this haunted house?' I thought that was really funny.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: Kids seem to get me when I play colleges - they like it because I go after them. They'll come up after and say I am like their dads, only funny.
author: Lewis Black

quote: You cannot dictate what people find funny, what people find attractive, or what people find scary. There is not a norm.
author: Guillermo del Toro

quote: You just try to be true to your idea of what is funny and what is also interesting.
author: John Oliver

quote: My parents always told me to be myself. I was always funny and silly as a kid. And I would always make them laugh. And they always told me to dream big and follow those dreams.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: The funny thing about insane people is that it is kind of the opposite of being a celebrity. Nobody envies you.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: I do like dating cynics - they tend to be incredibly funny.
author: Chris Pine

quote: I knew exactly what to do on Alien, it was funny.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: I'm the only man in the world with a marriage licence made out to whom it may concern.
author: Mickey Rooney

quote: I can't go on Gawker. I actually think the writing is really funny, but there is a chance that somebody is undercutting me.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I'd be hard-pressed to think of anybody who's made me laugh, who's funny, but who's also relentlessly positive.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: When my father died, my mother came back from being Mrs. Birkin to being Judy Campbell. She was a stunning actress. She came out of her shell. She was herself again: this very independent, funny, intellectual lady - and was able to perform again, which was her life before meeting my father squashed it out.
author: Jane Birkin

quote: There are a lot of funny things that happen in one's life.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I think universities are trying to figure out how we could use what we know about learning to change our education system, but it is sort of funny that they don't necessarily seem to be consulting the people who are sitting right there on campus.
author: Alison Gopnik

quote: Plus, I love comic writing. Nothing satisfies me more than finding a funny way to phrase something.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: I turned down 'Some Like It Hot.' See how smart I am? I felt I couldn't bring anything funny to it. The outfit was funny. I don't need to compete with the wardrobe.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: You find out in life that people really like you funny. So what do you give 'em? Humor. And then if you show them the other side, they don't like you as much. I find, too, that I can hide behind the idiot's mask being funny, and you never see the sorrow or the pain.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: It may sound funny, but it's true: I tried to put myself through the 12-step program. I didn't want to attend a real meeting; my role didn't really require that, and I feel those meetings are sort of sacred, and they're anonymous for a reason. I tried to deal with some of my love of snacks - and I relapsed a lot.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
author: Fred Allen

quote: I started writing when I was 9 years old. I was like this weird kid who would just stay in my room, typing little funny magazines and drawing comic strips.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: I never liked you, and I always will.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: This will sound really funny, but I'm so used to shooting in Hindi that shooting in English took a while to get used to.
author: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: I don't get a chance to be funny with the thrillers. I like to be funny, and I think I am really funny. So with 'Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life', it was fun to let loose.
author: James Patterson

quote: I think there's an interesting contradiction of having a young face and an old soul. There's something funny about it, and it also allows you to reinvent being old.
author: Matt Smith

quote: What really irks me is the snide victimizing suggestion from some that I have tried to be lighthearted and funny... Oh my God - this is so offensive.
author: Michael Leunig

quote: It doesn't matter how many people adore you or how skinny, successful, smart, talented, funny, kind, or compassionate you are. None of it matters if you don't see your wonderful self.
author: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: I'm a natural clown, I suppose, in writing, and one has to accept that; I can't do anything about it. I have written one or two novels which are not specifically funny. I wrote a study of Shakespeare which was not intended to be funny, but some people regard it as such.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: If your partner is consistently unhappy, it won't matter if they're incredibly sexy, wildly funny, impressively successful, adorably charismatic - your relationship will be weighed down under the heaviness of their moods.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Sometimes, things need to be so understated on film that I don't even see them as funny, which isn't my favorite style, comedically. When I watch film comedy, I like people that are a little bit more alive on the screen and wound up. I like volatility and unpredictability and other long words like those.
author: T. J. Miller

quote: I do find things funny. When you see life through the eyes of someone with a good sense of humor, which my grandmother did, life is a human comedy.
author: George Takei

quote: The funny thing about advertising is that it's not a zero-sum game... Historically, in the digital ad world, pie has gotten larger and it's possible for everyone to win, and it's perfectly possible that will continue to be true for quite some time.
author: Eric Schmidt

quote: I refuse to dress 'hot' for Halloween, 'cause I always have to have makeup and hair and look cute for my job. So on Halloween, I either go gory or weird or funny.
author: Rachel Platten

quote: Who included me among the ranks of the human race?
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: I have a sidekick, Keith Robinson, who's very funny. I've known Keith for over 20 years; he's my best friend.
author: Wanda Sykes

quote: You can't be funny unless you're tragic, and you can't be tragic unless you're funny.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: I don't think there's just one person for everyone. It would be very hard for me to be with a guy who was not bright or funny. And he'd have to see the absurdities of the world, not exactly as I see them necessarily.
author: Erica Jong

quote: There are people who think the film 'This Is Spinal Tap' is simply a very funny 'mockumentary.' Well, with Yes, we lived it. Take the hilarious scene in the film in which the bass player is trapped in a giant pod - that actually happened to Alan one night.
author: Rick Wakeman

quote: There's something very authentic about humor, when you think about it. Anybody can pretend to be serious. But you can't pretend to be funny.
author: Billy Collins

quote: I like Jacques Derrida; I think he's funny. I like my philosophy with a few jokes and puns. I know that that offends other philosophers; they think he's not taking things seriously, but he comes up with some marvellous puns. Why shouldn't you have a bit of fun while dealing with the deepest issues of the mind?
author: Alan Moore

quote: To label me an intellectual is a misunderstanding of what that is.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: I sang in the choir for years, even though my family belonged to another church.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: Politicians... talk in generalities and lies, and I think they've caused all our grief. They're so awful, they're really funny. I hate thinking this because my dad loved politics.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: My career only took off because of one football game. I thought it was funny. 'Playboy' called and offered me a cover just like that. I turned them down initially, because I was nervous about it and my boyfriend at the time didn't want me to do it, but they kept coming back, so I eventually said yes.
author: Pamela Anderson

quote: It's funny: I was a photographer before I was a programmer.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: One man's folly is another man's wife.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I follow the most random people on Twitter. I follow famous people like Khloe Kardashian, who surprisingly makes really funny tweets all the time.
author: Chloe Grace Moretz

quote: What's interesting about Laurel and Hardy is that in most comedy teams, there's a straight man, and then there's the funny guy. And with Laurel and Hardy, they're both the funny guy.
author: Christopher Guest

quote: To me, writing is remembering something funny that happened, or maybe something I said seven years ago.
author: Matthew Perry

quote: A lot of my stories about the old days, they're delicious and funny. But every time I recall the early days, it's painful. With every anecdote, it's painful because you're summoning up the terribly, terribly difficult life of my parents. And it's painful because I didn't realize at the time how hard it was for them.
author: Mario Cuomo

quote: 'Jurassic Park' movies don't fit into a specific genre. They're sci-fi adventures that also have to be funny, emotional, and scary as hell. That takes a lot of construction, but it can't feel designed.
author: Colin Trevorrow

quote: I've always enjoyed making people laugh. But in order for me to be funny, I have to get ticked off about something.
author: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Our national flower is the concrete cloverleaf.
author: Lewis Mumford

quote: I'm a very spiritual person, and I believe in God and all that kind of stuff. So my perfect type of guy would be spiritually grounded, extremely respectful and funny because I love to laugh.
author: Grace Gealey

quote: I did not have three thousand pairs of shoes, I had one thousand and sixty.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: When I was in college, I was in the theater department, which for anyone who has been involved in any kind of theater program, you know that it's really wacky and tight-knit, a real family. Me and my good friends from college would do random shows and plays that were sometimes serious, but most of the time really goofy and funny.
author: Darren Criss

quote: Life is funny, and that's why I celebrate it in my shows.
author: Loni Love

quote: Until you walk a mile in another man's moccasins you can't imagine the smell.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: It's funny how God will just keep using you, and our motto around our family forever has been, 'Just let Him use you.'
author: Kim Fields

quote: I have so many funny friends that I hang out and do bits with, and the fact that we can hire each other is amazing. I asked all of them to help make 'Kroll Show' the best that it can be. I'm selfishly trying to use their funny genius for my own benefit.
author: Nick Kroll

quote: I love a smart, well-written show, and '30 Rock,' well, you can't get any better than that. Tina Fey poos funny. There's nothing that she does that isn't funny. That show is an example of how brilliant she is. It's so smart. They've done some brilliant commentary about the 'Housewives' with 'Queen of Jordan,' their show-within-the-show.
author: Andy Cohen

quote: I saw a stationery store move.
author: Jay London

quote: As I get older, I just prefer to knit.
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: I think serial monogamy says it all.
author: Tracey Ullman

quote: If I'm in an uncomfortable situation, I think I can say something funny to defuse it. Sometimes you can't.
author: Jack Whitehall

quote: The real challenge lies in maintaining dignity while being funny. I am in awe of Krushna Abhishek's energy and Bharti Singh's wit. They are infectious and selfless.
author: Amruta Khanvilkar

quote: When I was born I owed twelve dollars.
author: George S. Kaufman

quote: I had gotten to a place where I truly believed everything I was called: 'not sexy,' 'not funny,' 'too intense,' desperate.' All those labels they gave me, I took them because there wasn't a trace of my true self left.
author: Naomi Watts

quote: I don't like happy stuff. I'm not funny.
author: Sondra Radvanovsky

quote: The way taxes are, you might as well marry for love.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: There's one thing about baldness, it's neat.
author: Don Herold

quote: Food, love, career, and mothers, the four major guilt groups.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.
author: Anthony Anderson

quote: If you have a secret, people will sit a little bit closer.
author: Rob Corddry

quote: I'm terrible at practical jokes. I do them too well, so they're not funny. I end up saying, 'Oh, no, I'm joking, I'm joking.'
author: Anna Torv

quote: People wince when something is in bad taste. They laugh when it's funny. If it's too dirty or wrong, they won't laugh. But if it's a big, dirty, smart, funny laugh, they love it.
author: Michael Patrick King

quote: 'Copper' is my first period piece. It's funny because I've been doing a lot of episodes of 'Elementary' with Johnny Lee Miller and Lucy Liu; they keep bringing me back on the show, and so I go from being an outstanding black doctor to being a kind of hood, ex-car thief who went through rehab in 'Elementary.'
author: Ato Essandoh

quote: I find that very appealing: the blurring of the lines between what's funny and what's tragic. And what's ordinary and what's not - the big things in the small things.
author: Rachel Joyce

quote: But it's funny that now I'm in such a happy situation, I look more objectively at my own past and see what others have seen for a long time and I'm just so glad I've been able to get to this point.
author: Rick Allen

quote: I do keep getting these bad girl roles. The funny thing is that, honestly, I don't think I'm believable as these aristocratic mean girls. But I do love playing them.
author: Katie McGrath

quote: Twitter's a funny one. I mean, it's good in some respects, but I can't stand it in other respects. You know there are too many opinions, people get opinions mixed up, and people get being rude mixed up with 'that's my opinion.'
author: Dionne Bromfield

quote: It's funny because everyone says you sleep when baby sleeps or you take a nap when baby takes a nap. That's true when you have one. When you have two, that is not true.
author: Vanessa Lachey

quote: When you're in love it's the most glorious two and a half days of your life.
author: Richard Lewis

quote: Never take a solemn oath. People think you mean it.
author: Norman Douglas

quote: I grew up in a little funny town called Xuzhou, in the countryside, very poor. We didn't have hot water. We were four children: three girls and a boy.
author: Wendi Deng Murdoch

quote: My parents are both really, really funny, and my little sister is a really good painter, and my other sister is a really good writer.
author: Michael Cera

quote: Everyone tells me I have a funny accent. It's because I copy people. I learned English at school but have best friends who are French, Australian, English and American; a very weird mix.
author: Caroline Winberg

quote: Eddie Drake is sort of this loose cannon, funny, edgy guy, who has this really foolish, foolish mustache.
author: Lee Tergesen

quote: When I go to a bar, I don't go looking for a girl who knows the capital of Maine.
author: David Brenner

quote: After all is said and done, sit down.
author: Bill Copeland

quote: One of my favorite comedies is 'Groundhog Day' and 'Scrooged.' I love Bill Murray, and I think he's a great example of an actor who is funny.
author: Fiona Gubelmann

quote: I consider myself very lucky. God has a funny way of bringing some things around and knocking you in the head with the ultimate destination. Something I should have achieved quite easily took me a long time to get around to. It came in His time, not mine.
author: Jim Morris

quote: My uncle Sammy was an angry man. He had printed on his tombstone: What are you looking at?
author: Margaret Smith

quote: I can't imagine actually singing on this show like I did on 'Felicity', but it would be kind of funny.
author: Amy Jo Johnson

quote: I loved being in the room with Mamet as a director - he is the most generous, funny, delightful person to work for every day.
author: Richard Thomas

quote: If you just stop and think, baby, honey, love is a funny thing. Whatever you put in, that's what you expect to gain.
author: Jimmy Reed

quote: If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Say what you will about the ten commandments, you must always come back to the pleasant fact that there are only ten of them.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Forty for you, sixty for me. And equal partners we will be.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I think anyone who has, you know, is in any sort of artistic pursuit, kind of goes up and down with the way they feel about their work. And I, for the most part, am pretty happy person. But, yeah. I go through definite periods of time where I'm not funny. I'm not good. I'm - I don't feel original.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: My kind of wanting to be funny didn't come from need, necessarily. The closest I can analyze it is that it was an easy way to make friends, I found out. It was just a great kind of social tool.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: Is everything funny? For me, yes. There's a positive to every negative. Even my divorce? For me, yes. If you go back and look at it, why it happened or how it happened, there's something in there that'll make you laugh.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: Something about New York, man: You can do more comedy there probably than you can anywhere in the world. If you're interested in being funny, New York is the place to go.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: I was the kid next door's imaginary friend.
author: Emo Philips

quote: I never saw anything funny in a car commercial - but that's OK. Whatever they wanted to do - it's their product and I'm the spokesperson, and I'm going to deliver.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Every man has his follies - and often they are the most interesting thing he has got.
author: Josh Billings

quote: I'll stick to finding the funny in the ordinary because my life is pretty ordinary and so are the lives of my friends - and my friends are hilarious.
author: Issa Rae

quote: I'm good at being funny.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: I've just seen really, really funny guys, and if I didn't know them, I wouldn't know they were funny from the television. I don't know what it does, it just sucks it away.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: People often can't separate, or can't understand, that to be funny is to be serious; it's a way of pulling people in and not scaring them off. I think a lot of the funny stuff, underneath it, there's a deep anxiety going on.
author: Nick Cave

quote: When you're eight years old nothing is your business.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: I'm kidding about having only a few dollars. I might have a few dollars more.
author: James Brown

quote: Who picks your clothes - Stevie Wonder?
author: Don Rickles

quote: When I eventually met Mr. Right I had no idea that his first name was Always.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: It's funny: I don't listen to too much rap. I don't listen to too much older hip-hop. If I do, it's Ja Rule.
author: Kehlani

quote: All my children inherited perfect pitch.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: Parrots make great pets. They have more personality than goldfish.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: I have a funny relationship with religion. I'm a big believer in ritualistic behavior as long as it doesn't hurt anybody. But I'm not a big fan of rules. And yet, we cannot live in a world without order.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: There's nothing wrong with being shallow as long as you're insightful about it.
author: Dennis Miller

quote: I've never been married, but I tell people I'm divorced so they won't think something is wrong with me.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: There's no such thing as soy milk. It's soy juice.
author: Lewis Black

quote: All the candy corn that was ever made was made in 1911.
author: Lewis Black

quote: A James Cagney love scene is one where he lets the other guy live.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I have a very low level of recognition, which is fine by me.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: I know I'm more on television, and I'm more recognisable than maybe even the players because they run and train, but I just stand there, and my face does all these funny things that everyone can see all the time.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: The reward of energy, enterprise and thrift is taxes.
author: William Feather

quote: California is a fine place to live - if you happen to be an orange.
author: Fred Allen

quote: We'll love you just the way you are if you're perfect.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Have enough sense to know, ahead of time, when your skills will not extend to wallpapering.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: I read part of it all the way through.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: That is not all I need. I need dogs. A house filled with dogs and a smart, funny, kind, loving girlfriend or wife.
author: Moby

quote: I grew up in Europe, where the history comes from.
author: Eddie Izzard

quote: You can't be a real spy and have everybody in the world know who you are and what your drink is. That's just hysterically funny.
author: Roger Moore

quote: God writes a lot of comedy... the trouble is, he's stuck with so many bad actors who don't know how to play funny.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: She was a handsome woman of forty-five and would remain so for many years.
author: J. B. Priestley

quote: But I really like hosting, I think it's a strength of mine. It allows me to improvise, and I love the spontaneity of that, and I think I'm funny behind the desk when interviewing someone.
author: Garry Shandling

quote: When I play discos in Belfast or freshers' week in Oxford, there are 1,800 kids dressed as me. It's odd, it's funny, and it pays really well.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: It is easy for me to love myself, but for ladies to do it is another question altogether.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: It's funny, I was talking to somebody who writes for a cop show, and he was saying how they aren't allowed to acknowledge Christmas, Thanksgiving, Valentine's Day, just because it has to be able to play forever.
author: Hannah Simone

quote: I wish I had the nerve not to tip.
author: Paul Lynde

quote: Katy Perry still gets me every time. She's very funny in person! We met at the Teen Choice Awards and she pulled my cheeks apart and told me how cute I was. My life was literally flashing before my eyes!
author: Niall Horan

quote: My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare.
author: Mike Myers

quote: A lot of baby boomers are baby bongers.
author: Kevin Nealon

quote: I would talk in iambic pentameter if it were easier.
author: Howard Nemerov

quote: I'm an optimist, but an optimist who carries a raincoat.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: For sheer sexiness, a man must be beautiful. Funny. yes. Clever, no.
author: Jilly Cooper

quote: I will say this about the truth - that it's one of those crisis rules, whether you are a client or someone who's living their life just every day - is that the truth has a funny way of not going away, and telling the truth is extremely important in dealing with any problem or crisis.
author: Judy Smith

quote: I love Charlie, Billy Burke's character. Writing for him is so spectacular, he's so funny and wry and every scene he's in he just takes. There's a scene in 'Eclipse' where Bella tells him she's a virgin, and it's the funniest, most awkward scene I've ever seen on film.
author: Melissa Rosenberg

quote: I'd never been in play long enough for the flowers to die in the dressing room.
author: Mercedes McCambridge

quote: I own and operate a ferocious ego.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: I'm a misplaced American, but don't know where I was misplaced.
author: Ruby Wax

quote: Here's the funny thing about the response I've been aware of to my dating famous people: It's been very negative. I'm either not good-looking enough, not a good enough actor or not successful enough for these people.
author: Dax Shepard

quote: It's funny; people get so doctrinaire about music. It should be the last thing you don't have an open mind about.
author: Randy Newman

quote: I remember trying to be funny, and both of my parents were terribly funny. My father was also very dignified, but my mother was an absolute ding-a-ling, a ripper.
author: Jack Lemmon

quote: Sometimes in the most tragic situation, something just profoundly funny happens.
author: David Hyde Pierce

quote: Someone told me that when they go to Vermont, they feel like they're home. I'm that way at Saks.
author: Caroline Rhea

quote: Dominic Sherwood would always tell me a joke right before it was my take or my close up. He'd say a funny joke, and I couldn't stop laughing, even after they said, 'Action.'
author: Emeraude Toubia

quote: The show is definitely not just about weight-loss physically. It's more about finding yourself. It's really funny because I realized at one of our table reads that 'Huge' was really about the weight that we carry around mentally.
author: Raven Goodwin

quote: It's funny because 'Felicity' didn't have a huge following, but the following it did have is hugely devoted, so people who are fanatics about 'Felicity' would run up to me all the time. I'd be at a bar, and someone will go, 'Hey, were you on Felicity? ...' I loved doing the show.
author: Ian Gomez

quote: If it bends, it's funny; if it breaks, it's not funny.
author: Kate O'Brien

quote: A vegetarian is a person who won't eat anything that can have children.
author: David Brenner

quote: It's funny, because readers think they want the characters to be blissfully happy, but it makes it kind of boring for the reader.
author: L.A. Weatherly
